TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectDataSource extends System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl

summary.span: 表示为多层 Web 应用程序体系结构中的数据绑定控件提供数据的业务对象。

span.span: Represents a business object that provides data to data-bound controls in multitier Web application architectures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [用途Purpose](#purpose) - [检索数据Retrieving Data](#retrieving_data) - [执行数据操作Performing Data Operations](#performing_data_operations) - [筛选数据Filtering Data](#filtering_data) - [缓存Caching](#caching) - [功能Features](#features) - [数据视图Data View](#data_view) - [使用 LINQ to SQLUsing LINQ to SQL](#using_linq_to_sql) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件适用于你创建的类。An control works with a class that you create. 创建检索和更新数据的方法，并向标记中的 控件提供这些方法的名称。You create methods that retrieve and update data, and you provide the names of those methods to the control in markup. 在呈现或回发处理期间， 会调用您指定的方法。During rendering or postback processing, the calls the methods that you have specified. 没有 控件的可视呈现。There is no visual rendering of the control. 因此， 不支持视觉功能，如 或 属性。As a result, the does not support visual features such as the or property. ## 目的Purpose 一种很常见的应用程序设计做法是将表示层与业务逻辑分离，并在业务对象中封装业务逻辑。A very common application design practice is to separate the presentation layer from business logic and to encapsulate the business logic in business objects. 这些业务对象在表示层和数据层之间形成了一个不同的层，产生了三层应用程序体系结构。These business objects form a distinct layer between the presentation layer and the data tier, resulting in a three-tier application architecture. 控件使开发人员可以使用 ASP.NET 数据源控件，同时保留其三层应用程序体系结构。The control enables developers to use an ASP.NET data source control while retaining their three-tier application architecture. 控件使用反射来创建业务对象的实例，并对其调用方法以检索、更新、插入和删除数据。The control uses reflection to create instances of business objects and to call methods on them to retrieve, update, insert, and delete data. 属性标识 使用的类的名称。The property identifies the name of the class that the works with. 控件创建并销毁每个方法调用的类的实例;它在 Web 请求的生存期内不会将对象保存在内存中。The control creates and destroys an instance of the class for each method call; it does not hold the object in memory for the lifetime of the Web request. 如果你使用的业务对象需要多个资源，或者创建和销毁开销较高，则这是一个重要的考虑因素。This is a serious consideration if the business object that you use requires many resources or is otherwise expensive to create and destroy. 使用昂贵的对象可能不是最佳的设计选择，但可以使用 、和 事件控制对象的生命周期。Using an expensive object might not be an optimal design choice, but you can control the life cycle of the object by using the , , and events. > [!NOTE] > 、、和 属性标识的方法可以是实例方法或 `static` （`Shared`）方法。The methods that are identified by the , , , and properties can be instance methods or `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) methods. 如果 `static` 方法（`Shared` 在 Visual Basic 中），则不会创建业务对象的实例，并且不会引发 、和 事件。If the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), an instance of the business object is not created, and the , , and events are not raised. ## 检索数据Retrieving Data 若要从业务对象中检索数据，请将 属性设置为用于检索数据的方法的名称。To retrieve data from a business object, set the property to the name of the method that retrieves data. 如果该方法未返回 或 对象，则运行时在 集合中包装对象。If the method does not return an or object, the object is wrapped by the runtime in an collection. 如果方法签名具有参数，则可以将 对象添加到 集合，然后将这些对象绑定到要传递给 属性指定的方法的值。If the method signature has parameters, you can add objects to the collection, and then bind them to the values that you want to pass to the method that is specified by the property. 为了使 控件使用这些参数，这些参数必须与方法签名中的参数的名称和类型相匹配。In order for the control to use the parameters, the parameters must match the names and types of the parameters in the method signature. 有关详细信息，请参阅[将参数用于 ObjectDataSource 控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。For more information, see [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4). 只要调用 方法， 控件就会检索数据。The control retrieves data whenever the method is called. 此方法提供对 属性指定的方法的编程访问。This method provides programmatic access to the method that is specified by property. 当调用其 `DataBind` 方法时，绑定到 的控件会自动调用由 属性指定的方法。The method that is specified by the property is called automatically by controls that are bound to the when their `DataBind` method is called. 如果设置数据绑定控件的 `DataSourceID` 属性，则控件会根据需要自动绑定到数据源中的数据。If you set the `DataSourceID` property of a data-bound control, the control automatically binds to data from the data source, as needed. 设置 `DataSourceID` 属性是将 控件绑定到数据绑定控件的建议方法。Setting the `DataSourceID` property is the recommended method for binding an control to a data-bound control. 另外，还可以设置 `DataSource` 属性，但必须显式调用数据绑定控件的 `DataBind` 方法。Alternatively, you can set the `DataSource` property, but then you must explicitly call the `DataBind` method of the data-bound control. 您可以随时以编程方式调用 方法来检索数据。You can call the method programmatically at any time to retrieve data. 有关将数据绑定控件绑定到数据源控件的详细信息，请参阅[使用数据源控件绑定到数据](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e41adfff-8fb8-449e-9cd1-9bd49788c5f7)。For more information about binding data-bound controls to data source controls, see [Binding to Data Using a Data Source Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e41adfff-8fb8-449e-9cd1-9bd49788c5f7). ## 执行数据操作Performing Data Operations 根据 控件处理的业务对象的功能，您可以执行数据操作，例如更新、插入和删除。Depending on the capabilities of the business object that the control works with, you can perform data operations, such as updates, insertions, and deletions. 若要执行这些数据操作，请为要执行的操作设置适当的方法名称和任何关联参数。To perform these data operations, set the appropriate method name and any associated parameters for the operation that you want to perform. 例如，对于更新操作，将 属性设置为业务对象方法的名称，该方法执行更新并将任何所需参数添加到 集合。For example, for an update operation, set the property to the name of the business object method that performs updates and add any required parameters to the collection. 如果 控件与数据绑定控件关联，则由数据绑定控件添加参数。If the control is associated with a data-bound control, the parameters are added by the data-bound control. 在这种情况下，需要确保方法的参数名称与数据绑定控件中的字段名称匹配。In this case, you need to ensure that the parameter names of the method match the field names in the data-bound control. 更新是在调用 方法时执行的，无论是通过代码显式调用，还是由数据绑定控件自动执行。The update is performed when the method is called, either explicitly by your code or automatically by a data-bound control. 和 操作遵循相同的常规模式。The same general pattern is followed for and operations. 假定业务对象一次一条记录执行这些类型的数据操作，而不是分批执行。Business objects are assumed to perform these types of data operations one record at a time, rather than batched. ## 筛选数据Filtering Data 如果数据作为 或 对象返回，则 控件可以筛选 属性检索的数据。The control can filter data that is retrieved by the property, if the data is returned as a or object. 您可以使用格式字符串语法将 属性设置为筛选表达式，并将表达式中的值绑定到 集合中指定的参数。You can set the property to a filtering expression by using a format string syntax and bind values in the expression to parameters that are specified in the collection. ## CachingCaching 尽管 不会在多个请求中保留业务对象的实例，但它可以缓存调用由 属性标识的方法的结果。Although the does not retain the instance of the business object across multiple requests, it can cache the result of calling the method identified by the property. 在缓存数据时，对 方法的后续调用会返回缓存的数据，而不是创建业务对象并使用反射调用其 。While the data is cached, subsequent calls to the method return the cached data instead of creating the business object and calling its using reflection. 缓存使你可以避免创建对象并以 Web 服务器上的内存的代价调用其数据方法。Caching lets you avoid creating the object and calling its data method at the expense of memory on the Web server. 当 属性设置为 `true`时， 会自动缓存数据， 属性设置为缓存在丢弃之前存储数据的秒数。The automatically caches data when the property is set to `true`, and the property is set to the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache is discarded. 还可以指定 属性和可选的 属性。You can also specify a property and an optional property. 控件允许缓存各种类型的数据，但不应缓存保留无法共享来服务多个请求（例如，打开的 对象）的资源或状态的对象，因为该对象的同一实例将用于为多个请求提供服务。The control allows you to cache all types of data, but you should not cache objects that retain resources or state that cannot be shared to service multiple requests (for example, an open object), because the same instance of the object will be used to service multiple requests. ## 功能Features 下表描述了 控件的功能。The following table describes the features of the control. |功能Capability|要求Requirements| |----------------|------------------| |选择Selecting|将 属性设置为业务对象方法的名称，该方法可选择数据，并以编程方式或通过使用数据绑定控件包含 集合中的任何必要参数。Set the property to the name of the business object method that selects data, and include any necessary parameters in the collection either programmatically or by using a data-bound control.| |排序Sorting|将 属性设置为带有排序条件的 方法中的参数的名称。Set the property to the name of the parameter in the method that carries the sort criteria.| |FilteringFiltering|将 属性设置为筛选表达式，并（可选）将任何参数添加到 集合，以便在调用 方法时筛选数据。Set the property to a filtering expression and optionally add any parameters to the collection to filter the data when the method is called. 属性指定的方法必须返回 或 。The method specified by the property must return a or .| |PagingPaging|如果 方法包含要检索的最大记录数的参数和要检索的第一条记录的索引，则支持数据源分页。Data source paging is supported, if the method contains parameters for the maximum number of records to retrieve and the index of the first record to retrieve. 必须分别在 "" 和 "" 属性中设置这些参数的名称。The names of those parameters must be set in the and properties, respectively. 即使 控件不支持直接在由 属性指定的方法中进行分页，数据绑定控件也可能能够执行分页。A data-bound control might be able to perform paging itself, even if the control does not support paging directly in the method specified by the property. 数据绑定控件实现此目的的要求是，由 属性指定的方法返回实现 接口的对象。The requirement for the data-bound control to be able to do this is that the method specified by the property return an object that implements the interface.| |更新Updating|将 属性设置为用于更新数据的业务对象方法的名称，并在 集合中包含所有必需的参数。Set the property to the name of the business object method that updates data, and include any necessary parameters in the collection.| |正在删除Deleting|将 属性设置为用于删除数据的业务对象方法或函数的名称，并在 集合中包含所有必需的参数。Set the property to the name of the business object method or function that deletes data, and include any necessary parameters in the collection.| |插入Inserting|将 属性设置为业务对象方法的名称或插入数据的函数，并在 集合中包含所有必要的参数。Set the property to the name of the business object method or function that inserts data, and include any necessary parameters in the collection.| |CachingCaching|根据所需的缓存数据缓存行为，将 属性设置为 `true`，以及 和 属性。Set the property to `true`, and the and properties according to the caching behavior you want for your cached data.| > [!NOTE] > 当你使用 类来更新或插入数据时，在客户端上输入的字符串不会自动从客户端区域性格式转换为服务器区域性格式。When you use the class to update or insert data, strings that are entered at the client are not automatically converted from the client culture format to the server culture format. 例如，客户端区域性可能将 DD/MM/YYYY 指定为日期格式，而服务器上的日期格式可能为 MM/DD/YYYY。For example, the client culture might specify DD/MM/YYYY as the date format, and the date format on the server might be MM/DD/YYYY. 在这种情况下，10月5日，2009将作为5/10/2009 输入 控件中，但将被解释为5月 10 2009 日。In that case, October 5, 2009 would be entered in a control as 5/10/2009 but would be interpreted as May 10, 2009. 2009年10月15日将输入为15/10/2009，并将被拒绝为无效日期。October 15, 2009 would be entered as 15/10/2009, and would be rejected as an invalid date. ## 数据视图Data View 与所有数据源控件一样， 控件与数据源视图类相关联。As with all data source controls, the control is associated with a data source view class. 虽然 控件是页面开发人员用来处理数据的接口，但 类是数据绑定控件所使用的接口。While the control is the interface that the page developer uses to work with data, the class is the interface that data-bound controls work with. 此外， 类描述数据源控件的功能，并执行实际工作。Additionally, the class describes the capabilities of the data source control, and performs the actual work. 控件只有一个关联 ，并且它始终命名为 "`DefaultView`"。The control has only one associated , and it is always named `DefaultView`. 当 方法公开 对象时，它的许多属性和方法会直接由 控件进行包装和公开。While the object is exposed by the method, many of its properties and methods are wrapped and exposed directly by the control. 在后台， 对象执行所有数据操作，包括检索、插入、更新、删除、筛选数据和对数据进行排序。Behind the scenes, the object performs all data operations, including retrieving, inserting, updating, deleting, filtering, and sorting the data. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## 使用 LINQ to SQLUsing LINQ to SQL 可以将 控件与 LINQ to SQL 类结合使用。You can use the control with a LINQ to SQL class. 为此，请将 属性设置为数据上下文类的名称。To do so, you set the property to the name of the data-context class. 还将 、、和 方法设置为数据上下文类中执行相应操作的方法。You also set the , , , and methods to the methods in the data-context class that perform the corresponding operations. 您必须为 事件创建事件处理程序，才能取消对数据上下文类的释放。You must create an event handler for the event in order to cancel disposing of the data-context class. 此步骤是必需的，因为 LINQ to SQL 支持延迟执行，而 控件尝试在选择操作之后释放数据上下文。This step is necessary because LINQ to SQL supports deferred execution, whereas the control tries to dispose the data context after the Select operation. 有关如何创建 LINQ to SQL 类的详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 项目中创建 LINQ to SQL 类](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information about how to create LINQ to SQL classes, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). 有关如何取消数据上下文类的释放的示例，请参阅 事件。For an example of how to cancel the disposing of a data context class, see the event. ## 使用实体框架Using the Entity Framework 您还可以将 控件与实体框架结合使用。You can also use the control with the Entity Framework. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用实体框架和 ObjectDataSource 控件](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=209117)。For more information, see [Using the Entity Framework and the ObjectDataSource Control](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=209117). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ``` ## Examples 本主题提供了包含源代码的 Visual Studio 网站项目：[下载](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/Project/Download/FileDownload.aspx?ProjectName=aspnetmsdnexamples&DownloadId=14838)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/Project/Download/FileDownload.aspx?ProjectName=aspnetmsdnexamples&DownloadId=14838). 本部分显示 .aspx 页中标记的 ，并显示它使用的业务对象。This section shows an in markup in an .aspx page and it shows the business objects that it works with. 示例是 .aspx 页。The example is the .aspx page. 它包含绑定到 控件的 控件。It contains a control that is bound to an control. 控件标记指定业务对象的名称，并指定要为检索数据而调用的业务对象方法的名称。The control markup specifies the name of the business object and the name of the business object method to call in order to retrieve data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/CS/objds1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/VB/objds1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示 .aspx 页中 控件使用的业务对象。The following example shows the business object that the control in the .aspx page uses. （许多其他 代码示例也使用此业务对象。）该示例包含以下两个基本类：(Many other code examples use this business object also.) The example consists of the following two basic classes: - `EmployeeLogic` 类是 使用的业务逻辑类。The `EmployeeLogic` class is the business logic class that the uses. - `NorthwindEmployee` 类定义由 `EmployeeLogic` 类的 `GetAllEmployees` 方法返回的数据对象。The `NorthwindEmployee` class defines the data object that is returned by the `GetAllEmployees` method of the `EmployeeLogic` class. 提供额外的 `NorthwindDataException` 类是一种方便的方式。An additional `NorthwindDataException` class is provided as a convenience. 这组示例类适用于 Northwind 商贸数据库，可用于 Microsoft SQL Server 和 Microsoft Access。This set of example classes works with the Northwind Traders database, which is available with Microsoft SQL Server and Microsoft Access. 若要获取完整的工作示例，必须使用所提供的 .aspx 页示例来编译并使用这些类。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes with the .aspx page example that is provided. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/CS/northwindemployee1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/VB/northwindemployee1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于位于 Bin 或 App_Code 目录中的代码，或在全局程序集缓存中注册的代码的完全限定类型名称，`typeName` 参数的值可以是部分限定的类型。The value of the `typeName` parameter can be a partially qualified type for code that is located in the Bin or App_Code directory or a fully qualified type name for code that is registered in the global assembly cache. 如果使用全局程序集缓存，则必须将相应的引用添加到 Machine.config 或 web.config 配置文件的 `assemblies` 部分。If you use the global assembly cache, you must add the appropriate reference to the `assemblies` section of the Machine.config or Web.config configuration file.

summary.span: 获取或设置以秒为单位的一段时间，数据源控件就在这段时间内缓存 属性检索到的数据。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time, in seconds, that the data source control caches data that is retrieved by the property.

value.span: 将 属性调用的结果缓存的秒数。

span.span: The number of seconds that the caches the results of a property invocation.

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

value.span: 该值不能为负数。

span.span: The value cannot be negative.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持数据缓存。The control supports data caching. 在缓存数据时，对 方法的调用将从缓存中检索数据，而不是从 使用的业务对象中检索数据。While data is cached, calls to the method retrieve data from the cache rather than from the business object that the works with. 缓存过期后， 方法从业务对象中检索数据，然后再次缓存数据。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the business object, and then caches the data again. 当 属性设置为 `true` 并且 属性设置为大于0的值时， 控件将自动缓存数据，该值指示在丢弃缓存条目之前缓存存储数据的秒数。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded. 值0表示无限长的缓存。A value of 0 indicates an infinitely long cache. 缓存按持续时间和 设置的组合进行管制。The cache is regulated by a combination of the duration and the setting. 如果 属性设置为 值，则 会在首次调用 方法时缓存数据，并将其保存在内存中，最多可为 属性指定的时间量。If the property is set to the value, the caches data on the first call to the method and holds it in memory for, at most, the amount of time that is specified by the property. 如果需要内存，则数据可能在持续时间之前释放。The data might be released before the duration time, if the memory is needed. 然后，在下一次调用 方法时刷新缓存。The cache is then refreshed during the next call to the method. 如果 属性设置为 值，则数据源控件会在第一次调用 方法时缓存数据，但在每次对 方法的后续调用中，将重置其保存缓存的时间窗口。If the property is set to value, the data source control caches data on the first call to the method, but resets the time window for which it holds the cache on each subsequent call to the method. 如果自上一次调用 方法以来没有任何活动的时间与 属性相等，则缓存过期。The cache expires if there is no activity for a time that is equal to the property since the last call to the method. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示 对象如何支持缓存。The first code example demonstrates how an object supports caching. 第二个代码示例演示如何实现返回 对象的包装方法，以启用 对象的缓存。The second code example demonstrates how to implement a wrapper method that returns a object to enable caching with an object. 下面的代码示例演示 控件如何支持缓存。The following code example demonstrates how an control supports caching. 若要启用缓存，必须实现用于检索数据的方法，该方法由 属性标识，以 对象的形式返回数据。To enable caching, you must implement the method that retrieves data, which is identified by the property, to return the data as a object. 在此示例中， 属性设置为 `true`，并设置 和 属性。In this example, the property is set to `true`, and the and properties are set. 将 属性返回的数据缓存30秒。The caches data that is returned by the property for 30 seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_6#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_6/CS/objds6cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_6#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_6/VB/objds6vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何实现一个包装方法，该方法返回 对象以启用 控件的缓存。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a wrapper method that returns a object to enable caching with an control. 在 `EmployeeLogic` 类的基实现中，`GetAllEmployees` 方法返回 对象。In the base implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` class, the `GetAllEmployees` method returns an object. 添加一个名为 `GetAllEmployeesAsDataSet` 的包装方法，该方法将 `NorthwindEmployee` 数据作为 返回，而不是完全重构对象以使用 Web 窗体页上的 。Instead of refactoring the object completely to work with the on a Web Forms page, a wrapper method named `GetAllEmployeesAsDataSet` is added that returns a set of `NorthwindEmployee` data as a . 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_5#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_5/CS/northwindemployee5.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_5#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_5/VB/northwindemployee5.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持数据缓存。The control supports data caching. 在缓存数据时，对 方法的调用将从缓存中检索数据，而不是从 使用的业务对象中检索数据。While data is cached, calls to the method retrieve data from the cache rather than from the business object that the works with. 缓存过期后， 方法从业务对象中检索数据，然后再次缓存数据。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the business object, and then caches the data again. 当 属性设置为 `true` 并且 属性设置为大于0的值时， 控件将自动缓存数据，该值指示在丢弃缓存条目之前缓存存储数据的秒数。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded. 值0指示无限长的缓存时间。A value of 0 indicates an infinitely long cache period. 缓存按持续时间和 设置的组合进行管制。The cache is regulated by a combination of the duration and the setting. 如果 属性设置为 值，则 会在首次调用 方法时缓存数据，并将其保存在内存中，最多可为 属性指定的时间量。If the property is set to the value, the caches data on the first call to the method and holds it in memory for, at most, the amount of time that is specified by the property. 如果需要内存，则数据可能在持续时间之前释放。The data might be released before the duration time, if the memory is needed. 然后，在下一次调用 方法时刷新缓存。The cache is then refreshed during the next call to the method. 如果将 属性设置为 值，则数据源控件会在第一次调用 方法时缓存数据，但会重置其保存缓存的时间窗口，以便每次对 方法的后续调用。If the property is set to the value, the data source control caches data on the first call to the method, but resets the time window for which it holds the cache for each subsequent call to the method. 如果自上一次调用 方法以来没有任何活动的时间与 属性相等，则缓存过期。The cache expires if there is no activity for a time that is equal to the property since the last call to the method. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示 对象如何支持筛选和缓存。The first code example demonstrates how an object supports filtering and caching. 第二个代码示例演示如何实现返回 对象的包装方法，以便使用 对象启用缓存和筛选。The second code example demonstrates how to implement a wrapper method that returns a object to enable caching and filtering with an object. 下面的代码示例演示 控件如何支持筛选和缓存。The following code example demonstrates how an control supports filtering and caching. 若要启用筛选和缓存，必须实现用于检索数据的方法，该方法由 属性标识，以 对象的形式返回数据。To enable filtering and caching, you must implement the method that retrieves data, which is identified by the property, to return the data as a object. 在此示例中，启用了缓存，因为 `EmployeeLogic` 对象将数据作为 返回， 属性设置为 `true`，并且 和 属性已设置。In this example, caching is enabled because the `EmployeeLogic` object returns data as a , the property is set to `true`, and the and properties are set. 将 属性返回的数据缓存30秒。The caches data that is returned by the property for 30 seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_6#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_6/CS/objds6cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_6#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_6/VB/objds6vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何实现一个包装方法，该方法返回 对象以使用 控件启用缓存和筛选。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a wrapper method that returns a object to enable caching and filtering with an control. 在 `EmployeeLogic` 类的基实现中，`GetAllEmployees` 方法返回 。In the base implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` class, the `GetAllEmployees` method returns an . 添加一个名为 `GetAllEmployeesAsDataSet` 的包装方法，该方法将 `NorthwindEmployee` 数据作为 返回，而不是完全重构对象以使用 Web 窗体页上的 。Instead of refactoring the object completely to work with the on a Web Forms page, a wrapper method named `GetAllEmployeesAsDataSet` is added that returns a set of `NorthwindEmployee` data as a . 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置一个用户定义的键依赖项，该键依赖项链接到数据源控件创建的所有数据缓存对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a user-defined key dependency that is linked to all data cache objects that are created by the data source control.

value.span: 一个键，它标识所有由 创建的缓存对象。

span.span: A key that identifies all cache objects created by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以设置为任意字符串值。The property can be set to any arbitrary string value. 当键到期时，所有缓存对象都显式到期。All cache objects are explicitly expired when the key is expired. 这允许你以编程方式使由 创建的缓存条目无效。This allows you to invalidate cache entries that are created by the from your own page code programmatically. 控件支持数据缓存。The control supports data caching. 在缓存数据时，对 方法的调用将从缓存中检索数据，而不是从 使用的业务对象中检索数据。While data is cached, calls to the method retrieve data from the cache rather than from the business object that the works with. 缓存过期后， 方法从业务对象中检索数据，然后再次缓存数据。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the business object, and then caches the data again. 当 属性设置为 `true` 并且 属性设置为大于0的值时， 控件将自动缓存数据，该值指示在丢弃缓存条目之前缓存存储数据的秒数。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded. 值0表示无限长的缓存。A value of 0 indicates an infinitely long cache. 可以设置 属性，以便在 控件创建的所有缓存项与键之间创建依赖关系。You can set the property to create a dependency between all cache entries that are created by the control and the key. 可以通过使密钥过期，随时以编程方式使所有缓存条目过期。You can expire all the cache entries programmatically at any time by expiring the key. 将 方法与当前 值作为参数，从而使密钥过期。Expire the key by using the method with the current value as the parameter. 将为 、、、和 属性的每个组合创建唯一的缓存条目。A unique cache entry is created for every combination of the , , , , and properties. 如果多个 控件使用相同的类型、方法和参数加载数据，则这些控件可以在这些方案中使用相同的缓存条目。Multiple controls can use the same cache entries in scenarios where they load data using the same type, method, and parameters. ## Examples 以下三个示例显示了一个网页、一个代码隐藏页类和一个数据访问类，该数据访问类从 Northwind 数据库的 Employees 表中检索记录。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that retrieve records from the Employees table in the Northwind database. 第一个示例显示一个网页，其中包含两个 控件、一个 控件和一个 控件。The first example shows a Web page that contains two controls, a control, and a control. 第一个 控件和 控件用于从数据库检索和显示雇员姓名。The first control and the control are used to retrieve and display employee names from the database. 第二个 控件和 控件用于检索和显示用户选择的员工记录。The second control and the control are used to retrieve and display the employee record that is selected by the user. 为 控件启用了缓存。Caching is enabled for the control. 因此，只会从数据库中检索一次每条记录。Therefore, each record is retrieved only one time from the database. 属性设置为 "EmployeeDetails"，但任何字符串值都可以用作键。The property is set to "EmployeeDetails", but any string value can work as the key. 该网页还包含一个 控件，用户可单击该控件以使缓存的数据过期。The Web page also includes a control that the user can click to expire the cached data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default2.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default2.aspx#3)] 第二个示例演示 事件的处理程序，以及 控件的 事件的处理程序。The second example shows a handler for the event and a handler for the event of the control. 事件处理程序将创建一个注册表项，其中的键设置为 值。The event handler creates a cache item with a key set to the value. 事件处理程序将移除其键等于 值的缓存项。The event handler removes the cache item whose key is equal to the value. 删除缓存项后，所有依赖于该键的缓存数据都将过期。When the cache item is removed, all the cached data that is dependent on the key is expired. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default2.aspx.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default2.aspx.vb#4)] 第三个示例显示与 Northwind 数据库交互的数据访问类。The third example shows the data access class that interacts with the Northwind database. 类使用 LINQ 查询 Employees 表。The class uses LINQ to query the Employees table. 该示例需要一个表示 Northwind 数据库的 LINQ to SQL 类和 "Employees" 表。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and the Employees table. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 项目中创建 LINQ to SQL 类](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.vb#5)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是仅将新值传递给 方法，还是将旧值和新值都传递给 方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether or not just the new values are passed to the method or both the old and new values are passed to the method.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定是否将旧值和新值的参数应用于由 属性指定的方法。This property determines whether parameters for old and new values are applied to the method specified by the property. 例如，如果 属性指定的方法返回 `Name` 和 `Number`的列的 控件，并且 属性设置为 字段，则会为 `Name` 方法的 `Number` 和 `Update` 创建参数。For example, if the method that is specified by the property returns a control with the columns `Name` and `Number`, and the property is set to the field, parameters are created for `Name` and `Number` for the `Update` method. 如果 属性设置为 值，则将为 `Name`、`Number`、`original_Name`和 `original_Number`创建参数。If the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name`, `Number`, `original_Name`, and `original_Number`. （原始值的参数的准确名称取决于 属性。）然后 确定 属性中指定的方法是否具有匹配的参数。(The exact name of the parameters for the original values depends on the property.) The then determines whether the method that is specified in the property has parameters that match. 并发控制是一种技术，当多个客户端访问和操作相同数据时，数据存储使用该技术来控制如何在存储区中读取和更改数据。Concurrency control is a technique that data stores use to control how data is read and changed in the store when multiple clients are accessing and manipulating the same data. 例如，一个客户端读取数据并向用户显示数据，而另一个客户端读取相同的数据并将其显示给其他用户。For example, one client reads data and presents it to a user, while another client reads the same data and presents it to a different user. 如果这两个用户更新数据并将其提交到数据存储，则可能会出现意外的结果，因为这两个客户端可能会为同一数据提供不同的值。If both users update the data and submit it to the data storage, an unexpected result might occur, because both clients might provide different values for the same data. 这被视为冲突。This is considered a conflict. 通过将 属性设置为 值，`Update` 方法可以将旧值和新值与原始数据源进行比较，以检测冲突并根据需要对其进行处理。By setting the property to the value, the `Update` method can then compare the old and new values to the original data source to detect conflicts and handle them as necessary. 属性委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 属性。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置某个类的名称， 控件将该类用于更新、插入或删除数据操作中的参数，而不是从数据绑定控件传递个别的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a class that the control uses for a parameter in an update, insert, or delete data operation, instead of passing individual values from the data-bound control.

value.span: 部分或完全限定类名，用于标识可由 用作 、 或 操作的参数的对象类型。

span.span: A partially or fully qualified class name that identifies the type of the object that the can use as a parameter for an , , or a operation.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以创建一个聚合多个数据字段值的对象，而不是指定传递到 、和 方法的多个参数。Instead of specifying several parameters that are passed to the , , and methods, you can create one object that aggregates several data field values. 此对象将传递给方法，而不是多个参数。This one object is passed to the methods, instead of several parameters. 绑定到数据绑定控件的 控件的默认行为是：数据绑定控件为数据源中的每个参数创建一个 的对象。The default behavior of an control that is bound to a data-bound control is that the data-bound control creates a object for each parameter in the data source. 如果业务对象具有多个字段，则生成的方法还会有多个字段。If the business object has many fields, the resulting method also has many fields. 属性允许您指定一个类型，该类型具有每个数据字段的属性。The property allows you to specify a type that has a property for each data field. 然后，运行时将创建一个对象并设置其所有属性，而不是向方法传递多个参数。Then, instead of passing several parameters to the method, the runtime creates one object and sets all of its properties. 此对象将添加到方法调用的 parameters 集合。This one object is added to the parameters collection for the method call. 属性指定的类型必须具有无参数的无参数构造函数，因此 控件可以创建该类型的实例。The type that is specified by the property must have a parameterless constructor that has no parameters, so the control can create an instance of the type. 该类型还必须具有可设置的属性，这些属性允许 控件使用从数据绑定控件传递的值填充对象。The type must also have settable properties that allow the control to populate the object with values that are passed from the data-bound control. 控件上的属性名称应与数据绑定控件传递的值的参数名称完全匹配。The property names on the control are expected to exactly match the parameter names of values that are passed by the data-bound control. 设置 属性并且 控件与数据绑定控件关联时， 和 属性指定的方法都必须具有在 属性中指定的类型的一个参数。When the property is set and the control is associated with a data-bound control, the methods that are specified by the and properties must each have one parameter of the type that is specified in the property. 如果 属性设置为 值，则 属性指定的方法必须具有 属性中指定的类型的一个参数。If the property is set to the value, the method that is specified by the property must have one parameter of the type that is specified in the property. 如果 属性设置为 值，则 属性指定的方法必须具有 属性中指定的类型的两个参数。If the property is set to the value, the method that is specified by the property must have two parameters of the type that is specified in the property. 第一个参数包含原始值;第二个参数包含新值。The first parameter contains the original values; the second parameter contains the new values. 属性委托给与 控件关联的 的 属性。The property delegates to the property of the that is associated with the control. ## Examples 节包含两个代码示例。The section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 属性实现将所有参数值组合为一个对象的类型。The first code example demonstrates how to implement a type that combines all parameter values into one object, using the property. 第二个代码示例演示使用第一个代码示例中使用的两个类的网页。The second code example shows the Web page that uses the two classes that are used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性实现将所有参数值组合为一个对象的类型。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a type that combines all parameter values into one object, using the property. `AggregateData` 类的 select 方法返回一个 对象，其中包含两个名为 `Name` 和 `Number`的列。The select method of the `AggregateData` class returns a object with two columns named `Name` and `Number`. 同样，`NewData` 类定义两个读/写属性，`Name` 和 `Number`。Similarly, the `NewData` class defines two read/write properties, `Name` and `Number`. `AggregateData` 类的 `Insert` 方法采用 `NewData`类型的一个参数。The `Insert` method of the `AggregateData` class takes one parameter of type `NewData`. 的 `TypeName` 属性设置为 `AggregateData`， 属性设置为 `NewData`。The `TypeName` property of the is set to `AggregateData` and the property is set to `NewData`. [!code-csharp[ObjectDataSourceDataObjectTypeName#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceDataObjectTypeName/CS/AggregateData.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ObjectDataSourceDataObjectTypeName#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceDataObjectTypeName/VB/AggregateData.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例演示使用前面的代码示例中使用的两个类的网页。The following code example shows the Web page that uses the two classes that are used in the preceding code example. [!code-aspx-csharp[ObjectDataSourceDataObjectTypeName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceDataObjectTypeName/CS/AggregateDataPageCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ObjectDataSourceDataObjectTypeName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceDataObjectTypeName/VB/AggregateDataPageVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 通过用 集合中的所有参数调用由 属性标识的方法，执行删除操作。

span.span: Performs a delete operation by calling the method that is identified by the property with any parameters that are in the collection.

returns.span: 如果在 事件中设置了 的 属性，则为表示从基础数据存储中删除的行数的值，否则为 -1。

span.span: A value that represents the number of rows deleted from the underlying data storage, if the property of the is set in the event; otherwise, -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在执行 操作之前，将调用 方法来引发 事件。Before the operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理 事件以检查参数的值，并在 操作之前执行任何预处理。You can handle the event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before a operation. 若要执行删除操作， 对象使用反射来创建由 属性标识的对象的实例。To perform a delete operation, the object uses reflection to create an instance of the object that is identified by the property. 然后，它使用任意关联的 属性调用由 属性标识的方法。It then calls the method that is identified by the property, using any associated properties. 如果删除参数来自关联的数据绑定控件，则将根据 属性创建参数的名称。If the deletion parameters come from an associated data-bound control, the name of the parameters is created according to the property. 操作完成后，将调用 方法来引发 事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理 事件以检查任何返回值、输出参数和异常，并执行任何后续处理。You can handle the event to examine any return values, output parameters, and exceptions, and to perform any post-processing. 方法委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 方法。The method delegates to the method of the object that is associated with the control. ## 数据绑定控件Data-Bound Controls 控件与数据绑定控件（如 控件）关联时，无需从页代码中调用 方法。When the control is associated with a data-bound control, such as the control, it is not necessary to call the method from page code. 改为直接通过数据绑定控件调用 方法。The method is invoked directly by the data-bound control instead. 有关参数合并、对象生存期和方法解析的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Deleted As ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler

summary.span: 操作完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件以检查返回值或输出参数的值，或确定 操作完成后是否引发了异常。Handle the event to examine the values of a return value or output parameters, or to determine whether an exception was thrown after a operation has completed. 可从与事件关联的 对象中获取返回值、输出参数和异常处理属性。The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the object that is associated with the event. 您可以使用 对象的 属性来返回从 方法中删除的行数。You can use the property of the object to return the number of rows that were deleted from the method. 为此，请设置 属性。To do this, set the property. 如果从 属性指定的方法返回已删除的行数，则可以从 对象的 属性中获取值。If you return the number of deleted rows from the method that is specified by the property, the value is available from the property of the object. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何将 对象与业务对象和 控件结合使用来删除数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to delete data. 第二个代码示例演示了第一个代码示例中使用的 `EmployeeLogic` 类。The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和 控件结合使用来删除数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初， 控件将使用 属性指定的方法来检索 `EmployeeLogic` 对象中的数据，以显示一组所有员工。Initially, the control displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 由于 属性设置为 `true`， 控件会自动显示 "**删除**" 按钮。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果单击 "**删除**" 按钮，则将使用 属性指定的方法和 集合中指定的任何参数执行删除操作。If you click the **Delete** button, the delete operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，还执行了一些预处理和后处理步骤。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. 在执行操作之前调用 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` 委托来处理 事件，并在操作完成后调用 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` 委托来处理 事件，以执行异常处理。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the operation is performed and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the operation has completed to perform exception handling. 在此代码示例中，如果引发了 `NorthwindDataException`，则它由 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` 方法进行处理。In this code example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/objds10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/objds10vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了前面的代码示例中使用的 `EmployeeLogic` 类。The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/northwindemployee10.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/northwindemployee10.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DeleteMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DeleteMethod : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由 控件调用以删除数据的方法或函数的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the method or function that the control invokes to delete data.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示 用于删除数据的方法或函数的名称。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the method or function that the uses to delete data.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 假定业务对象每次删除一条记录，而不是成批删除数据。The business object is assumed to delete data one record at a time, rather than in a batch. 属性委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 属性。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. 请确保为 集合中的 控件配置的参数名称与 select 方法返回的列名称相匹配。Make sure that the parameter names configured for the control in the collection match the column names that are returned by the select method. ## 对象生存期Object Lifetime 属性标识的方法可以是实例方法，也可以是 `static` （`Shared` Visual Basic）方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果它是实例方法，则每次调用 属性时都会创建并销毁业务对象。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the property is called. 在调用 属性之前，您可以处理 和 事件来处理业务对象。You can handle the and events to work with the business object before the property is called. 你还可以处理在调用 属性后引发的 事件。You can also handle the event that is raised after the property is called. 如果业务对象实现 接口，则在销毁对象之前调用 方法。If the business object implements the interface, the method is called before the object is destroyed. 如果该方法是 `static` （`Shared` Visual Basic）方法，则永远不会创建业务对象，也不能处理 、和 事件。If the method is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, the business object is never created and you cannot handle the , , and events. ## 参数合并Parameter Merging 从三个源将参数添加到 集合：Parameters are added to the collection from three sources: - 在运行时从数据绑定控件。From the data-bound control, at run time. - 从 `DeleteParameters` 元素中，以声明方式。From the `DeleteParameters` element, declaratively. - 从 `Deleting` 方法，以声明方式。From the `Deleting` method, declaratively. 首先，将从数据绑定控件生成的所有参数添加到 集合中。First, any parameters that are generated from data-bound controls are added to the collection. 例如，如果 控件绑定到 控件，该控件的列 `Name` 和 `Number`，则 `Name` 和 `Number` 的参数将添加到集合中。For example, if the control is bound to a control that has the columns `Name` and `Number`, parameters for `Name` and `Number` are added to the collection. 参数的确切名称取决于 属性。The exact name of the parameter depends on the property. 这些参数的数据类型为 `string`。The data type of these parameters is `string`. 接下来，将添加 `DeleteParameters` 元素中列出的参数。Next, the parameters that are listed in the `DeleteParameters` element are added. 如果找到 `DeleteParameters` 元素中与已在 集合中的参数相同的参数，则会修改现有参数，使其与 `DeleteParameters` 元素中指定的参数匹配。If a parameter in the `DeleteParameters` element is found with the same name as a parameter that is already in the collection, the existing parameter is modified to match the parameter that is specified in the `DeleteParameters` element. 通常，这用于修改参数中数据的类型。Typically, this is used to modify the type of the data in the parameter. 最后，你可以以编程方式在 事件中添加和移除参数，这会在 方法运行之前发生。Finally, you can programmatically add and remove parameters in the event, which occurs before the method is run. 合并参数后，解析方法。The method is resolved after the parameters are merged. 下一节将讨论方法解析。Method resolution is discussed in the next section. ## 方法解析Method Resolution 调用 方法时，数据绑定控件中的数据字段、`DeleteParameters` 元素中以声明方式创建的参数以及在 事件处理程序中添加的参数都将合并。When the method is called, the data fields from the data-bound control, the parameters that were created declaratively in the `DeleteParameters` element, and the parameters that were added in the event handler are all merged. （有关详细信息，请参阅前面的部分。）然后， 对象将尝试查找要调用的方法。(For more information, see the preceding section.) The object then attempts to find a method to call. 首先，它会查找一个或多个具有在 属性中指定的名称的方法。First, it looks for one or more methods with the name that is specified in the property. 如果未找到匹配项，则会引发 异常。If no match is found, an exception is thrown. 如果找到匹配项，则它将查找匹配的参数名称。If a match is found, it then looks for matching parameter names. 例如，假设 属性指定的类型有两个名为 `DeleteARecord`的方法。For example, suppose the type that is specified by the property has two methods named `DeleteARecord`. 一个 `DeleteARecord` 具有一个参数，`ID`，另一个 `DeleteARecord` 具有两个参数，`Name` 和 `Number`。One `DeleteARecord` has one parameter, `ID`, and the other `DeleteARecord` has two parameters, `Name` and `Number`. 如果 集合只有一个名为 `ID`的参数，则将调用只包含 `ID` 参数的 `DeleteARecord` 方法。If the collection has only one parameter named `ID`, the `DeleteARecord` method with just the `ID` parameter is called. 解析方法时未检查参数类型。The type of the parameter is not checked in resolving the methods. 参数的顺序并不重要。The order of the parameters does not matter. 如果设置了 属性，则会以不同的方式解析方法。If the property is set, the method is resolved in a different way. 查找 属性中指定了名称的方法，该属性采用 属性中指定的类型的一个参数。The looks for a method with the name that is specified in the property that takes one parameter of the type that is specified in the property. 在这种情况下，参数名称并不重要。In this case, the name of the parameter does not matter. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何将 对象与业务对象和 控件结合使用来删除数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to delete data. 第二个代码示例演示了第一个代码示例中使用的 `EmployeeLogic` 类。The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和 控件结合使用来删除数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初， 控件将使用 属性指定的方法来检索 `EmployeeLogic` 对象中的数据，以显示一组所有员工。Initially, the control displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 由于 属性设置为 `true`， 控件会自动显示 "**删除**" 按钮。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果单击 "**删除**" 按钮，则将使用 属性指定的方法和 集合中指定的任何参数执行删除操作。If you click the **Delete** button, the delete operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，还执行了一些预处理和后处理步骤。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. 调用 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` 委托在执行操作之前处理 事件，并在操作完成后调用 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` 委托来处理 事件，以执行异常处理。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the operation is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the operation has completed to perform exception handling. 在此示例中，如果引发了 `NorthwindDataException`，则由 `NorthwindDataException` 委托处理。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by the `NorthwindDataException` delegate. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/objds10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/objds10vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了前面的代码示例中使用的 `EmployeeLogic` 类。The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/northwindemployee10.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/northwindemployee10.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DeleteParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 获取参数集合，该集合包含由 方法使用的参数。

span.span: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the method.

value.span: ，包含由 方法使用的参数。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中包含的参数的名称和类型必须匹配 方法签名中的参数的名称和类型。The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the names and types of the parameters in the method signature. 参数名称受 属性影响，并区分大小写。The parameter names are affected by the property and are case-sensitive. 集合中的参数取决于数据绑定控件中的数据、以声明方式指定的参数和以编程方式添加的参数。The parameters in the collection depend on the data that is in the data-bound control, the parameters that are specified declaratively, and the parameters that are added programmatically. 有关详细信息，请参阅 中的 "参数合并" 和[将参数用于 ObjectDataSource 控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。For more information, see "Parameter Merging" in and [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4). 属性检索与 控件关联的 对象所包含的 属性。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. 有关参数合并、对象生存期和方法解析的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see . ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何将 对象与业务对象和 控件结合使用来删除数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to delete data. 第二个代码示例演示了第一个代码示例中使用的 `EmployeeLogic` 类。The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用具有业务对象的 控件的 属性和用于删除数据的 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property of the control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初， 控件将使用 属性指定的方法来检索 `EmployeeLogic` 对象中的数据，以显示一组所有员工。Initially, the control displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 由于 属性设置为 `true`， 控件会自动显示 "**删除**" 按钮。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果单击 "**删除**" 按钮，则会调用 事件，其中包含两个参数。If you click the **Delete** button, the event is called with two parameters. 一个参数 `EmpID`来自 控件，并基于 属性。One parameter, `EmpID`, comes from the control, and is based on the property. 其他参数来自声明性 属性。The other parameter comes from the declarative property. `EmployeeLogic` 类重载了 `DeleteEmployee` 方法。The `EmployeeLogic` class overloads the `DeleteEmployee` method. 一个重载采用 `NorthwindEmployee` 参数，另一个重载采用名为 `anID`的 参数。One overload takes a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter, and the other takes an parameter named `anID`. 在 事件中， 属性中的条目将调整为仅包含一个名为 `anID` 的参数，其值来自 `original_EmpID`。In the event, the entries in the property are adjusted to include only one parameter named `anID` with the value from `original_EmpID`. 如果存在事件处理程序，则调用匹配的 `DeleteEmployee` 方法。When the event handler exists, the matching `DeleteEmployee` method is called. 下面的代码示例演示显示 控件并处理 事件的网页。The following code example shows the Web page that displays the control and handles the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11/CS/objds11cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11/VB/objds11vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了前面的代码示例中使用的 `EmployeeLogic` 类。The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11/CS/northwindemployee11.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11/VB/northwindemployee11.vb#2)]

summary.span: 在 操作前发生。

span.span: Occurs before a operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件以执行特定于您的应用程序的其他初始化，验证参数的值，或在 控件执行删除操作之前更改参数值。Handle the event to perform additional initialization that is specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the delete operation. 参数可用作由 对象公开的 属性访问的 集合。The parameters are available as an collection that is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 您可以通过将 的 属性设置为 `true`来取消删除操作。You can cancel the delete operation by setting the property of the to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何将 对象与业务对象和 控件结合使用来删除数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to delete data. 第二个代码示例演示了第一个代码示例中使用的 `EmployeeLogic` 类。The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和 控件结合使用来删除数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初， 控件将使用 属性指定的方法来检索 `EmployeeLogic` 对象中的数据，以显示一组所有员工。Initially, the control displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 由于 属性设置为 `true`， 控件会自动显示 "**删除**" 按钮。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果单击 "**删除**" 按钮，则将使用 属性指定的方法和 集合中指定的任何参数执行删除操作。If you click the **Delete** button, the delete operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，还执行了一些预处理和后处理步骤。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. 调用 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` 委托在执行操作之前处理 事件，并在操作完成后调用 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` 委托来处理 事件，以执行异常处理。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the operation is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the operation has completed to perform exception handling. 在此代码示例中，如果引发了 `NorthwindDataException`，则它由 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` 方法进行处理。In this code example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/objds10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/objds10vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了前面的代码示例中使用的 `EmployeeLogic` 类。The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/northwindemployee10.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/northwindemployee10.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool EnableCaching { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property EnableCaching As Boolean
public: virtual property bool EnableCaching { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.EnableCaching : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件是否启用数据缓存。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control has data caching enabled.

value.span: 如果为数据源控件启用数据缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if data caching is enabled for the data source control; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持数据缓存。The control supports data caching. 在缓存数据时，调用 方法将从缓存中检索数据，而不是 创建业务对象的实例并调用其数据方法。While data is cached, calls to the method retrieve data from the cache rather than the creating an instance of the business object and calling its data method. 缓存过期后， 方法从业务对象中检索数据，然后再次缓存数据。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the business object, and then caches the data again. 当 属性设置为 `true` 并且 属性设置为大于0的值时， 控件将自动缓存数据，该值指示在丢弃缓存条目之前缓存存储数据的秒数。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded. 值0表示无限长的缓存。A value of 0 indicates an infinitely long cache. ## Examples 以下三个示例显示了一个网页、一个代码隐藏页类和一个数据访问类，该数据访问类从 Northwind 数据库的 Employees 表中检索记录。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that retrieve records from the Employees table in the Northwind database. 第一个示例显示一个网页，其中包含两个 控件、一个 控件和一个 控件。The first example shows a Web page that contains two controls, a control, and a control. 第一个 控件和 控件用于从数据库检索和显示雇员姓名。The first control and the control are used to retrieve and display employee names from the database. 第二个 控件和 控件用于检索和显示用户选择的员工记录。The second control and the control are used to retrieve and display the employee record that is selected by the user. 为 控件启用了缓存。Caching is enabled for the control. 因此，只会从数据库中检索一次每条记录。Therefore, each record is retrieved only one time from the database. 属性设置为 "EmployeeDetails"，但任何字符串值都可以用作键。The property is set to "EmployeeDetails", but any string value can work as the key. 该网页还包含一个 控件，用户可单击该控件以使缓存的数据过期。The Web page also includes a control that the user can click to expire the cached data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default2.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default2.aspx#3)] 第二个示例演示 事件的处理程序，以及 控件的 事件的处理程序。The second example shows a handler for the event and a handler for the event of the control. 事件处理程序将创建一个注册表项，其中的键设置为 值。The event handler creates a cache item with a key set to the value. 事件处理程序将移除其键等于 值的缓存项。The event handler removes the cache item whose key is equal to the value. 删除缓存项后，所有依赖于该键的缓存数据都将过期。When the cache item is removed, all the cached data that is dependent on the key is expired. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default2.aspx.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default2.aspx.vb#4)] 第三个示例显示与 Northwind 数据库交互的数据访问类。The third example shows the data access class that interacts with the Northwind database. 类使用 LINQ 查询 Employees 表。The class uses LINQ to query the Employees table. 该示例需要一个表示 Northwind 数据库的 LINQ to SQL 类和 "Employees" 表。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and the Employees table. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 项目中创建 LINQ to SQL 类](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnablePaging { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.EnablePaging : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示数据源控件是否支持对它检索的数据集进行分页。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data source control supports paging through the set of data that it retrieves.

value.span: 如果数据源控件通过它检索的数据支持分页，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the data source control supports paging through the data it retrieves; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过设置 的 ""、""、"" 和 "" 属性，然后在业务对象中使用正确的参数定义 select 方法，可处理 控件进行分页。Paging by the control is handled by setting the , , , and properties of the and defining a select method in the business object with the proper parameters. 如果将 属性设置为 `true`，则 集合将为请求的第一行包含两个附加参数，并为请求的行数提供两个参数。When the property is set to `true`, the collection includes two additional parameters for the first row that is requested and the number of rows that are requested. 这两个参数的命名方式由 和 属性定义。These two parameters are named as defined by the and properties. `Select` 方法应从指定索引处开始，返回请求的行数。The `Select` method should return the requested number of rows, starting at the specified index. 由于数据可能不会被页面大小平均分割，因此最后一页可能包含较少的行。Because the data might not divide evenly by the page size, the last page might contain fewer rows. 因此，所请求的行数实际上是返回的最大行数。Thus, the number of rows that are requested is actually the maximum number of rows that are returned. 如果对关联的数据绑定控件启用了分页，则数据绑定控件将调用 `Select` 方法，该方法具有所需的起始索引和行数。When paging is enabled on the associated data-bound control, the data-bound control calls the `Select` method with the start index and number of rows that are required. 此外，如果设置 属性，数据绑定控件将在呈现页导航控件之前调用方法。Additionally, if the property is set, the data-bound control calls the method before rendering the pager controls. 例如，如果某个 控件的页大小启用了分页，而该控件的页大小为5，并且由 属性指定的方法返回20个，则在页导航中只显示4个页。For example, if a control has paging enabled with a page size of 5, and the method that is specified by the property returns 20, only 4 pages are displayed in the pager. 属性委托给 对象的 属性。The property delegates to the property of the object. ## Examples 以下三个示例演示了一个网页、一个代码隐藏页类和一个数据访问类，使用户能够选择页面中显示的记录数。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable the user to pick how many records are displayed in the page. 网页包含 属性设置为 `true`的 控件。The Web page contains an control whose property is set to `true`. 属性设置为方法的名称，该方法返回查询中的记录总数。The property is set to the name of a method that returns the total number of records in the query. 属性和 属性设置为 Select 方法中使用的参数的名称。The property and the property are set to the names of the parameters that are used in the Select method. 此页还包含一个 控件。The page also contains a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx#1)] 第二个示例显示 控件的 事件的处理程序。The second example shows a handler for the event of the control. 处理程序中的代码将 属性设置为用户的选择。The code in the handler sets the property to the user's selection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx.vb#2)] 第三个示例显示了从 Customers 表检索数据的数据访问类。The third example shows the data access class that retrieves data from the Customers table. 它包括一个名为 `GetSubsetOfEmployees`的方法，该方法分配给 控件的 属性。It includes a method named `GetSubsetOfEmployees`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 该示例还包括一个名为 `GetEmployeeCount`的方法，该方法分配给 控件的 属性。The example also includes a method named `GetEmployeeCount`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 类使用 LINQ 查询 Customers 表。The class uses LINQ to query the Customers table. 该示例需要一个表示 Northwind 数据库和 Customers 表的 LINQ to SQL 类。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Customers table. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 项目中创建 LINQ to SQL 类](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/App_Code/CustomerLogic.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/App_Code/CustomerLogic.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FilterExpression { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.FilterExpression : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当调用由 属性指定的方法时应用的筛选表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets a filtering expression that is applied when the method that is specified by the property is called.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示在使用由 属性标识的方法或函数检索数据时应用的筛选表达式。

span.span: A string that represents a filtering expression that is applied when data is retrieved by using the method or function identified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 方法返回 或 对象时， 控件才支持筛选数据。The control supports filtering data only when the method returns a or object. 用于 属性的语法是格式字符串样式表达式。The syntax that is used for the property is a format string-style expression. 筛选表达式语法与 属性接受的语法相同。The filter expression syntax is the same syntax that is accepted by the property. 如果将参数添加到 集合，还可以包含格式字符串占位符。If you add parameters to the collection, you can also include format string placeholders. 例如，在要替换参数值的表达式中包含 `"{0}"`。For example, include `"{0}"` in the expression to substitute for parameter values. 占位符根据 集合中参数的索引进行替换。The placeholders are replaced according to the index of the parameter in the collection. 可以在 属性中包含参数。You can include parameters in the property. 如果参数的类型是字符串或字符类型，则将参数括在单引号内。If the type of the parameter is a string or character type, enclose the parameter in single quotation marks. 如果参数是数值类型，则不需要引号。Quotation marks are not required if the parameter is a numeric type. 集合包含为在 属性中找到的占位符计算的参数。The collection contains the parameters that are evaluated for the placeholders that are found in the property. 属性委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 属性。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. > [!NOTE] > 应该验证从客户端接收的任何筛选器参数值。You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只需将参数值替换为筛选表达式，并将其应用于 方法返回的 或 对象。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the or object that is returned by the method. 如果使用 属性作为安全措施来限制返回的项目数，则必须在进行筛选之前验证参数值。If you are using the property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件显示筛选的数据，以便从中间层业务对象中检索数据，并使用 控件来显示结果。The following code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an control to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object and a control to display the results. 仅当检索数据的方法将其检索为 或 对象时， 控件才能筛选数据。The control can filter data only when the method that retrieves the data retrieves it as a or object. 出于此原因， 属性标识将数据作为 检索的业务对象方法。For this reason, the property identifies a business object method that retrieves data as a . 此代码示例由 控件、 控件、 控件和**提交**按钮组成。The code example consists of a control, a control, the control, and a **Submit** button. 默认情况下，将使用其中一个 Northwind 商贸员工的名称填充 。By default, the is populated with the name of one of the Northwind Traders employees. 显示 中的名称所标识的员工的相关信息。The displays information about the employee that is identified by the name in the . 若要检索另一个雇员的数据，请在 中输入雇员的全名，然后单击 "**提交**" 按钮。To retrieve data on another employee, enter the full name of the employee in the , and then click the **Submit** button. 属性指定一个表达式，该表达式用于筛选由 属性指定的方法检索的数据。The property specifies an expression that is used the collection. 在此示例中，参数占位符由单引号界定，因为参数的类型是可能包含空格的字符串类型。In this example, the parameter placeholder is bounded by single quotation marks because the type of the parameter is a string type that might contain spaces. 如果参数的类型是数值或日期类型，则不需要用到边界引号。If the type of the parameter is a numeric or date type, bounding quotation marks are not required. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件，以便在 控件执行筛选操作之前对筛选器参数值执行验证操作。Handle the event to perform validation operations on filter parameter values before the control performs a filter operation. 您可以通过将 的 属性设置为 `true`来取消所选操作。You can cancel the selected operation by setting the property of the to `true`. 仅当设置了 属性时才引发事件。The event is raised only if the property is set. 事件委托给与 控件关联的 的 事件。The event delegates to the event of the that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 应该验证从客户端接收的任何筛选器参数值。You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只需将参数值替换为筛选表达式，并将其应用于 方法返回的 或 对象。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the or object that is returned by the method. 如果使用 属性作为安全措施来限制返回的项目数，则必须在进行筛选之前验证参数值。If you are using the property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

parameter in single quotation marks. 如果参数是数值类型，则不需要引号。Quotation marks are not required if the parameter is a numeric type. 属性检索与 控件关联的 对象所包含的 属性。The property retrieves the property that is contained employee, in the , enter the full name of the employee, and then click the **Submit** button. 属性指定一个表达式，该表达式用于筛选 属性检索的数据。The property specifies an expression that is used to filter the data that is retrieved by the property. 它使用计算结果为 集合中包含的参数的参数占位符。It uses parameter placeholders that are evaluated to the parameters that are contained in the collection. 在此示例中，参数占位符由单引号界定，因为参数的类型是可能包含空格的字符串类型。In this example, the parameter placeholder is bounded by single quotation marks because the type of the parameter is a string type that might contain spaces. 如果参数的类型是数值或日期类型，则不需要用到边界引号。If the type of the parameter is a numeric or date type, bounding quotation marks are not required. 集合包含一个参数 ，该参数绑定到 控件。The collection contains one parameter, a object that is bound to the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 应该验证从客户端接收的任何筛选器参数值。You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只需将参数值替换为筛选表达式，并将其应用于 方法返回的 对象。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件仅支持一个数据源视图。The control supports only one data source view. 与所有数据源视图对象一样，与数据源控件关联的 定义其功能，执行从基础数据存储检索数据所需的所有工作，并执行排序、插入、删除和更新等操作。As with all data source view objects, the that is associated with the data source control defines its capabilities, performs all the work that is necessary to retrieve data from the underlying data storage, and performs operations such as sorting, inserting, deleting, and updating. 方法旨在通过数据绑定控件（而不是页代码）进行调用。The method is intended to be called by data-bound controls, not by page code.

summary.span: 通过调用由 属性标识的方法和 集合中的所有参数，执行插入操作。

span.span: Performs an insert operation by calling the method that is identified by the property and any parameters in the collection.

returns.span: 一个表示插入到基础数据存储中的行数的值。

span.span: A value that represents the number of rows inserted into the underlying data storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在执行 操作之前，将调用 方法来引发 事件。Before the operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理 事件以检查参数的值，并在 操作之前执行任何预处理。You can handle the event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before an operation. 若要执行插入操作， 对象使用反射来创建由 属性标识的对象的实例。To perform an insert operation, the object uses reflection to create an instance of the object that is identified by the property. 然后，它使用任意关联的 属性调用由 属性标识的方法。It then calls the method that is identified by the property, using any associated properties. 操作完成后，将调用 方法来引发 事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理 事件以检查任何返回值、输出参数和异常，并执行任何后续处理。You can handle the event to examine any return values, output parameters, and exceptions, and to perform any post-processing. 方法委托给与 控件关联的 的 方法。The method delegates to the method of the that is associated with the control. 有关参数合并、对象生存期和方法解析的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see . ## 数据绑定控件Data-Bound Controls 当 对象与数据绑定控件（如 控件）关联时，无需从页代码中调用 方法。When the object is associated with a data-bound control, such as the control, it is not necessary to call the method from page code. 改为直接通过数据绑定控件调用 方法。The method is invoked directly by the data-bound control instead.
