MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Inserting As ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler

summary.span: 在 操作前发生。

span.span: Occurs before an operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件以执行特定于您的应用程序的其他初始化，验证参数的值，或在 控件执行插入操作之前更改参数值。Handle the event to perform additional initialization that is specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the insert operation. 参数可用作由 对象公开的 属性访问的 集合。The parameters are available as an collection that is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何将 对象与业务对象和 控件结合使用以插入数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to insert data. 第二个代码示例提供了在第一个代码示例中使用的中间层业务对象的示例。The second code example provides an example of the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和 控件结合使用以插入数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 最初， 显示新的 `NorthwindEmployee` 记录以及自动生成的 "**插入**" 按钮。Initially, the displays a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 在 控件的字段中输入数据后，单击 "**插入**" 按钮。After you enter data into the fields of the control, click the **Insert** button. 属性标识执行插入操作的方法。The property identifies which method performs the insert operation. 在此示例中，`UpdateEmployeeInfo` 方法用于执行插入;但是，它需要 `NorthwindEmployee` 参数才能插入数据。In this example, the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is used to perform an insert; however, it requires a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter to insert the data. 出于此原因， 控制自动传递的字符串集合是不够的。For this reason, the collection of strings that the control passes automatically is not sufficient. `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` 委托是处理 事件的 对象，它使你能够在执行 操作之前操作输入参数。The `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` delegate is an object that handles the event and enables you to manipulate the input parameters before the operation proceeds. 由于 `UpdateEmployeeInfo` 方法需要将 `NorthwindEmployee` 对象作为参数，因此将使用字符串的集合创建一个参数，并使用该方法所需的参数名称（`ne`）将其添加到 集合。Because the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method requires a `NorthwindEmployee` object as a parameter, one is created using the collection of strings and is added to the collection using a parameter name (`ne`) that the method expects. 使用现有的中间层对象作为数据源时，可以执行如下所述的步骤，这些类型和方法不是专门用于 控件的类型和方法。You might perform steps like these when using an existing middle-tier object as a data source with types and methods that are not designed specifically for use with the control. 执行 操作时，将调用由 属性标识的方法。When the operation is performed, the method that is identified by the property is called. 如果对象的 `Insert` 方法具有包含参数的方法签名，则 集合必须包含名称与方法签名参数相匹配的参数， 方法才能成功完成。If the `Insert` method of the object has a method signature that includes parameters, the collection must contain a parameter with names that match the method signature parameters for the method to complete successfully. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/objds4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/objds4vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例使用的中间层业务对象的示例。The following code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 此代码示例包含两个基本类：The code example consists of two basic classes: - `EmployeeLogic` 类，该类是一个封装业务逻辑的无状态类。The `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a stateless class that encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee` 类，该类是一个仅包含从数据层加载和保存数据所需的基本功能的模型类。The `NorthwindEmployee` class, which is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. 提供额外的 `NorthwindDataException` 类是一种方便的方式。An additional `NorthwindDataException` class is provided as a convenience. 若要获取完整的工作示例，必须编译并使用这些类。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes. 不完全实现 `UpdateEmployeeInfo` 方法，因此当您试验此示例时，不会将数据插入 Northwind 商贸数据库中。The `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is not completely implemented, so you will not insert data into the Northwind Traders database when you experiment with this example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/northwindemployee4.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/northwindemployee4.vb#2)]

member this.InsertMethod : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由 控件调用以插入数据的方法或函数的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the method or function that the control invokes to insert data.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示 用于插入数据的方法或函数的名称。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the method or function that the uses to insert data.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 假定业务对象每次插入一条记录，而不是在批处理中插入数据。The business object is assumed to insert data one record at a time, rather than in a batch. 属性委托给与 对象关联的 对象的 属性。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the object. ## 对象生存期Object Lifetime 属性标识的方法可以是实例方法，也可以是 `static` （`Shared` Visual Basic）方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果它是实例方法，则每次调用 属性指定的方法时都会创建并销毁业务对象。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method specified by the property is called. 在调用 属性之前，您可以处理 和 事件来处理业务对象。You can handle the and events to work with the business object before the property is called. 你还可以处理在调用 属性指定的方法之后引发的 事件。You can also handle the event that is raised after the method that is specified by the property is called. 如果业务对象实现 接口，则在销毁对象之前调用 方法。If the business object implements the interface, the method is called before the object is destroyed. 如果该方法是 `static` 的（`Shared` Visual Basic），则永远不会创建业务对象，也不能处理 、和 事件。If the method is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the business object is never created and you cannot handle the , , and events. ## 参数合并Parameter Merging 从三个源将参数添加到 集合：Parameters are added to the collection from three sources: - 在运行时从数据绑定控件。From the data-bound control, at run time. - 从 `InsertParameters` 元素中，以声明方式。From the `InsertParameters` element, declaratively. - 从 `Inserting` 方法，以编程方式。From the `Inserting` method, programmatically. 首先，将从数据绑定控件生成的所有参数添加到 集合中。First, any parameters that are generated from data-bound controls are added to the collection. 例如，如果 控件绑定到 控件，该控件具有 `Name` 和 `Number`的列，则 `Name` 和 `Number` 的参数将添加到集合中。For example, if the control is bound to a control that has the columns `Name` and `Number`, the parameters for `Name` and `Number` are added to the collection. 这些参数的数据类型为 `string`。The data type of these parameters is `string`. 接下来，将添加 `InsertParameters` 元素中列出的参数。Next, the parameters that are listed in the `InsertParameters` element are added. 如果找到 `InsertParameters` 元素中与已在 集合中的参数相同的参数，则会修改现有参数，使其与 `InsertParameters` 元素中指定的参数匹配。If a parameter in the `InsertParameters` element is found with the same name as a parameter that is already in the collection, the existing parameter is modified to match the parameter that is specified in the `InsertParameters` element. 通常，这用于修改参数中数据的类型。Typically, this is used to modify the type of the data in the parameter. 最后，你可以以编程方式在 事件中添加和移除参数，这会在 方法运行之前发生。Finally, you can programmatically add and remove parameters in the event, which occurs before the method is run. 合并参数后，解析方法。The method is resolved after the parameters are merged. 下一节将讨论方法解析。Method resolution is discussed in the next section. > [!IMPORTANT] > 你应验证从客户端接收的任何参数值。You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只需将参数值替换为 属性即可。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the property. ## 方法解析Method Resolution 调用 方法时，数据绑定控件中的数据字段、`InsertParameters` 元素中以声明方式创建的参数以及在 事件处理程序中添加的参数都将合并。When the method is called, the data fields from the data-bound control, the parameters that were created declaratively in the `InsertParameters` element, and the parameters that were added in the event handler are all merged. （有关详细信息，请参阅前面的部分。）然后， 对象将尝试查找要调用的方法。(For more information, see the preceding section.) The object then attempts to find a method to call. 首先，它会查找一个或多个具有在 属性中指定的名称的方法。First, it looks for one or more methods with the name that is specified in the property. 如果未找到匹配项，则会引发 异常。If no match is found, an exception is thrown. 如果找到匹配项，则它将查找匹配的参数名称。If a match is found, it then looks for matching parameter names. 例如，假设 属性指定的类型有两个名为 `InsertARecord`的方法。For example, suppose a type that is specified by the property has two methods named `InsertARecord`. 一个 `InsertARecord` 具有一个参数，`ID`，另一个 `InsertARecord` 具有两个参数，`Name` 和 `Number`。One `InsertARecord` has one parameter, `ID`, and the other `InsertARecord` has two parameters, `Name` and `Number`. 如果 集合只有一个名为 `ID`的参数，则将调用只包含 `ID` 参数的 `InsertARecord` 方法。If the collection has only one parameter named `ID`, the `InsertARecord` method with just the `ID` parameter is called. 解析方法时未检查参数类型。The type of the parameter is not checked in resolving the methods. 参数的顺序并不重要。The order of the parameters does not matter. 如果设置了 属性，则会以不同的方式解析方法。If the property is set, the method is resolved in a different way. 查找 属性中指定了名称的方法，该属性采用 属性中指定的类型的一个参数。The looks for a method with the name that is specified in the property that takes one parameter of the type that is specified in the property. 在这种情况下，参数名称并不重要。In this case, the name of the parameter does not matter. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何将 对象与业务对象和 控件结合使用以插入数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to insert data. 第二个代码示例提供了在第一个代码示例中使用的中间层业务对象的示例。The second code example provides an example of the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和 控件结合使用以插入数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 最初， 显示新的 `NorthwindEmployee` 记录以及自动生成的 "**插入**" 按钮。Initially, the displays a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 在 控件的字段中输入数据后，单击 "**插入**" 按钮。After you enter data into the fields of the control, click the **Insert** button. 属性标识执行插入操作的方法。The property identifies which method performs the insert operation. 在此示例中，`UpdateEmployeeInfo` 方法用于执行插入;但是，它需要 `NorthwindEmployee` 参数才能插入数据。In this example, the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is used to perform an insert; however, it requires a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter to insert the data. 出于此原因， 控制自动传递的字符串集合是不够的。For this reason, the collection of strings that the control passes automatically is not sufficient. `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` 委托是处理 事件的 对象，它使你能够在执行 操作之前操作输入参数。The `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` delegate is an object that handles the event and enables you to manipulate the input parameters before the operation proceeds. 由于 `UpdateEmployeeInfo` 方法需要将 `NorthwindEmployee` 对象作为参数，因此将使用字符串的集合创建一个参数，并使用该方法所需的参数名称（`ne`）将其添加到 集合。Because the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method requires a `NorthwindEmployee` object as a parameter, one is created using the collection of strings and is added to the collection using a parameter name (`ne`) that the method expects. 使用现有的中间层对象作为数据源时，可以执行如下所述的步骤，这些类型和方法不是专门用于 控件的类型和方法。You might perform steps like these when using an existing middle-tier object as a data source with types and methods that are not designed specifically for use with the control. 执行 操作时，将调用由 属性标识的方法。When the operation is performed, the method that is identified by the property is called. 如果对象的 `Insert` 方法具有包含参数的方法签名，则 集合必须包含名称与方法签名参数相匹配的参数， 方法才能成功完成。If the `Insert` method of the object has a method signature that includes parameters, the collection must contain a parameter with names that match the method signature parameters for the method to complete successfully. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/objds4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/objds4vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例使用的中间层业务对象的示例。The following code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 此代码示例包含两个基本类：The code example consists of two basic classes: - `EmployeeLogic` 类，该类是一个封装业务逻辑的无状态类。The `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a stateless class that encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee` 类，该类是一个仅包含从数据层加载和保存数据所需的基本功能的模型类。The `NorthwindEmployee` class, which is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. 提供额外的 `NorthwindDataException` 类是一种方便的方式。An additional `NorthwindDataException` class is provided as a convenience. 若要获取完整的工作示例，必须编译并使用这些类。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes. 不完全实现 `UpdateEmployeeInfo` 方法，因此当您试验此示例时，不会将数据插入 Northwind 商贸数据库中。The `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is not completely implemented, so you will not insert data into the Northwind Traders database when you experiment with this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中包含的参数的名称和类型必须匹配 属性签名中的参数的名称和类型。The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the names and types of the parameters that are in the property signature. 参数名称区分大小写。The parameter names are case sensitive. 在使用提供参数的数据绑定控件（如 和 控件）时， 控件会自动将集合中显式指定的所有参数与数据绑定控件提供的参数合并。When working with data-bound controls that supply parameters, such as the and controls, the control automatically merges any parameters that are explicitly specified in the collection with the parameters that are provided by the data-bound control. 这一点很重要，因为数据绑定控件始终将其参数作为 类型提供，如果方法签名包含数字或日期类型，则必须在具有正确类型的 集合中显式包含一个参数。This is important because data-bound controls always supply their parameters as types, and if the method signature includes numeric or date types, you must explicitly include a parameter in the collection with the correct type. 否则， 控件将根据集合中的参数定义的类型尝试强制转换参数。Otherwise, the control attempts to cast the parameters according to the type that is defined by the parameters in the collection. 有关详细信息，请参阅[将参数用于 ObjectDataSource 控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。For more information, see [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4). 属性检索与 控件关联的 包含的 属性。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the that is associated with the control. 有关参数合并、对象生存期和方法解析的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see . ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何将 对象与业务对象和 控件结合使用以插入数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to insert data. 第二个代码示例提供了在第一个代码示例中使用的 `Insert` 方法的示例实现。The second code example provides an example implementation of the `Insert` method that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和 控件结合使用以插入数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 最初， 显示文本框，您可以在其中输入新 `NorthwindEmployee` 记录的数据以及自动生成的 "**插入**" 按钮。Initially, the displays text boxes in which you can enter data for a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 在 控件的字段中输入数据后，单击 "**插入**" 按钮。After you enter data into the fields of the control, click the **Insert** button. 属性标识执行插入操作的方法。The property identifies which method performs the insert operation. 单击 "**插入**" 按钮时，将使用 属性指定的方法和 集合中指定的任何参数执行该操作。If you click the **Insert** button, the operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，在与监察员 ID 相对应的 集合中指定一个参数。In this code example, one parameter is specified in the collection that corresponds to the supervisor's ID. 这是因为，即使 ID 作为 对象显示在 控件的 集合中，它也将作为字符串传递到 控件。This is because even though the ID is displayed in the collection for the control as a object, it is passed as a string to the control. 通过将其显式添加到 集合，并将其 属性设置为 值，它将作为 （而不是字符串）通过 将其正确传递给方法。By adding it explicitly to the collection with a property set to the value, it will be passed correctly by the to the method as an , not as a string. 执行 操作时，将调用由 属性标识的方法。When the operation is performed, the method that is identified by the property is called. 如果对象的 方法具有包含参数的方法签名，则 集合必须包含名称与方法签名参数匹配的参数， 方法才能成功完成。If the method of the object has a method signature that includes parameters, the collection must contain parameters that have names that match the method signature parameters for the method to complete successfully. > [!IMPORTANT] > 你应验证从客户端接收的任何参数值。You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只需将参数值替换为 属性即可。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8/CS/objds8cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8/VB/objds8vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例使用的 `Insert` 方法的示例实现。The following code example provides an example implementation of the `Insert` method that the preceding code example uses. 将 `InsertNewEmployeeWrapper` 方法添加到 类概述中提供的 `EmployeeLogic` 中间层对象，使对象能够更轻松地在 Web 方案中与 控件一起工作，而无需对实际的业务逻辑进行重大的重写。The `InsertNewEmployeeWrapper` method is added to the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier object that is provided in the class overview to enable the object to work more easily with the control in Web scenarios, without a substantial rewrite to the actual business logic. 若要运行该示例，必须在 类概述中提供 `NorthwindEmployee` 类。To run the example, you must have the `NorthwindEmployee` class that is provided in the class overview. 此示例仅演示了如何使用参数将 连接到用于获取新数据库记录的数据的业务对象方法。This example illustrates only how to connect the to a business object method that gets data for a new database record by using parameters. 此示例不会将记录添加到数据库，因为 `NorthwindEmployee` 类的 `Save` 方法不包括用于更新数据库的代码。The example does not add records to the database, because the `Save` method of the `NorthwindEmployee` class does not include code to update the database. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8/CS/northwindemployee8.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8/VB/northwindemployee8.vb#3)]

summary.span: 加载以前保存的 控件的视图状态。

span.span: Loads the previously saved view state of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过，控件开发人员可以重写此方法，以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)). 方法用于加载以前保存的 控件的视图状态。The method is used to load the previously saved view state of the control.

para.span: 方法主要由控件开发人员在扩展 控件时使用。

span.span: The method is used primarily by control developers when extending the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置业务对象数据检索方法参数的名称，该参数用于指示要检索的数据源分页支持的记录数。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the business object data retrieval method parameter that is used to indicate the number of records to retrieve for data source paging support.

value.span: 用于指示要检索的记录数的 参数名。

span.span: The name of the parameter that is used to indicate the number of records to retrieve.

value.span: 默认值为"maximumRows"。

span.span: The default is "maximumRows".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于支持数据源分页。The property is used to support data source paging. 有关 控件如何支持分页的信息，请参阅 。For information about how paging is supported by the control, see . 属性委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 属性。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. ## Examples 以下三个示例演示了一个网页、一个代码隐藏页类和一个数据访问类，使用户能够选择页面中显示的记录数。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable the user to pick how many records are displayed in the page. 网页包含 属性设置为 `true`的 控件。The Web page contains an control whose property is set to `true`. 属性设置为方法的名称，该方法返回查询中的记录总数。The property is set to the name of a method that returns the total number of records in the query. 属性和 属性设置为 Select 方法中使用的参数的名称。The property and the property are set to the names of the parameters that are used in the Select method. 此页还包含一个 控件。The page also contains a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx#1)] 第二个示例显示 控件的 事件的处理程序。The second example shows a handler for the event of the control. 处理程序中的代码将 属性设置为用户的选择。The code in the handler sets the property to the user's selection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx.vb#2)] 第三个示例显示了从 Customers 表检索数据的数据访问类。The third example shows the data access class that retrieves data from the Customers table. 它包括一个名为 `GetSubsetOfEmployees`的方法，该方法分配给 控件的 属性。It includes a method named `GetSubsetOfEmployees`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 该示例还包括一个名为 `GetEmployeeCount`的方法，该方法分配给 控件的 属性。The example also includes a method named `GetEmployeeCount`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 类使用 LINQ 查询 Customers 表。The class uses LINQ to query the Customers table. 该示例需要一个表示 Northwind 数据库和 Customers 表的 LINQ to SQL 类。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Customers table. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 项目中创建 LINQ to SQL 类](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/App_Code/CustomerLogic.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/App_Code/CustomerLogic.vb#3)]

summary.span: 在创建由 属性标识的对象之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the object that is identified by the property is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件，以便调用业务对象上的其他方法、设置属性或执行特定于业务对象的其他初始化， 对象将调用业务对象数据方法来执行数据操作。Handle the event to call other methods on the business object, set properties, or perform other initialization that is specific to the business object before the object calls the business object data method to perform a data operation. 对象的引用由 属性访问，该属性由 对象公开。A reference to the object is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 如果标识用于执行数据操作的方法是 `static` （`Shared` 在 Visual Basic 中），则永远不会引发 和 事件。If the method that is identified to perform the data operation is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the and events are never raised. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ObjectCreating As ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler

summary.span: 在创建由 属性标识的对象之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the object that is identified by the property is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果标识用于执行数据操作的方法是 `static` （`Shared` 在 Visual Basic 中），则永远不会引发 和 事件。If the method that is identified to perform the data operation is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the and events are never raised. 控件将自动调用业务对象的无参数构造函数，以使用反射来创建它的实例。The control automatically calls the parameterless constructor of a business object to create an instance of it using reflection. 处理 事件以显式调用另一个构造函数，并将生成的对象实例设置为关联 对象的 属性。Handle the event to explicitly call another constructor, and set the instance of the object that results to the property of the associated object. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何将 对象与业务对象和 控件结合使用来显示信息。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to display information. 第二个代码示例提供了在第一个代码示例中使用的中间层业务对象。The second code example provides the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和 控件结合使用来显示信息。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to display information. 对于您的网页执行的每个数据操作，都可以使用非常昂贵的业务对象（就时间或资源而言）。You might work with a business object that is very expensive to create (in terms of time or resources) for every data operation your Web page performs. 处理昂贵对象的一种方法是创建一次实例，然后将其缓存起来进行后续操作，而不是为每个数据操作创建并销毁它。One way to work with an expensive object might be to create an instance of it once, and then cache it for subsequent operations instead of creating and destroying it for every data operation. > [!NOTE] > 在生产应用程序中，多个请求可能会同时使用同一个实例。In a production application, multiple requests might end up simultaneously using the same instance. 因此，需要在线程安全的方式下实现该对象。Therefore, the object needs to be implemented in a thread-safe manner. 此代码示例演示了此模式。This code example demonstrates this pattern. 您可以处理 事件以首先检查某个对象的缓存，并且仅创建该对象的实例（如果尚未缓存）。You can handle the event to check the cache for an object first, and only create an instance of the object, if one is not already cached. 然后，处理 事件以便缓存业务对象以供将来使用，而不是将其销毁。Then, handle the event to cache the business object for future use, instead of destroying it. 在此代码示例中，将 对象的 属性设置为 `true`，以指示 不调用对象上的 方法。In this code example, the property of the object is set to `true` to direct the to not call method on the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/objds16cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/objds16vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例使用的中间层业务对象示例。The following code example provides the example middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 此代码示例由 `EmployeeLogic` 类定义的基本业务对象组成，该对象是一个封装业务逻辑的有状态类。The code example consists of a basic business object, defined by the `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a stateful class that encapsulates business logic. 若要获取完整的工作示例，必须将此代码编译为库，并从 ASP.NET 页（.aspx 文件）使用这些类。For a complete working example, you must compile this code as a library and use these classes from an ASP.NET page (.aspx file). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/northwindemployee16.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/northwindemployee16.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ObjectDisposing As ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler

summary.span: 在丢弃由 属性标识的对象之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the object that is identified by the property is discarded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件始终在丢弃业务对象的实例之前引发。The event is always raised before the instance of the business object is discarded. 如果业务对象实现 接口，则在引发此事件后调用 方法。If the business object implements the interface, the method is called after this event is raised. 处理 事件，以便调用对象上的其他方法、设置属性或在销毁对象之前执行特定于对象的清理。Handle the event to call other methods on the object, set properties, or perform clean-up that is specific to the object before the object is destroyed. 对象的引用由 属性访问，该属性由 对象公开。A reference to the object is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 将 控件与 LINQ to SQL 类结合使用时，必须在 事件的处理程序中取消对数据上下文类的释放。When you use a control with a LINQ to SQL class, you must cancel the disposing of the data-context class in an handler for the event. 此步骤是必需的，因为 LINQ to SQL 支持延迟执行，而 控件尝试在选择操作之后释放数据上下文。This step is necessary because LINQ to SQL supports deferred execution, whereas the control tries to dispose the data context after the Select operation. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何将 对象与业务对象和 控件结合使用来显示信息。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to display information. 第二个代码示例提供了在第一个代码示例中使用的中间层业务对象。The second code example provides the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和 控件结合使用来显示信息。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to display information. 对于您的网页执行的每个数据操作，都可以使用非常昂贵的业务对象（就时间或资源而言）。You might work with a business object that is very expensive to create (in terms of time or resources) for every data operation your Web page performs. 处理昂贵对象的一种方法是创建一次实例，然后将其缓存起来进行后续操作，而不是为每个数据操作创建并销毁它。One way to work with an expensive object might be to create an instance of it once, and then cache it for subsequent operations instead of creating and destroying it for every data operation. 此示例演示了此模式。This example demonstrates this pattern. 您可以处理 事件以便首先检查某个对象的缓存，并仅创建该对象的实例（如果尚未缓存）。You can handle the event to check the cache for an object first, and only create an instance of it, if one is not already cached. 然后，处理 事件以便缓存业务对象以供将来使用，而不是将其销毁。Then, handle the event to cache the business object for future use, instead of destroying it. 在此代码示例中，将 对象的 属性设置为 `true`，以指示 不调用对象上的 方法。In this code example, the property of the object is set to `true` to direct the to not call the method on the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/objds16cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/objds16vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例使用的中间层业务对象示例。The following code example provides the example middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 此代码示例由 `EmployeeLogic` 类定义的基本业务对象组成，该对象是一个封装业务逻辑的有状态类。The code example consists of a basic business object, defined by the `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a stateful class that encapsulates business logic. 若要获取完整的工作示例，必须将此代码编译为库，并从 ASP.NET 页（.aspx 文件）使用这些类。For a complete working example, you must compile this code as a library and use these classes from an ASP.NET page (.aspx file). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/northwindemployee16.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/northwindemployee16.vb#2)] 下面的示例演示了在将 控件与 LINQ to SQL 类结合使用时如何处理 事件。The following example shows how to handle the event when using an control with a LINQ to SQL class. ```vb Public Sub ExampleObjectDisposing(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs) e.Cancel = True End Sub ``` ```csharp public void ExampleObjectDisposing(object sender, ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs e) { e.Cancel = true; } ```

summary.span: 获取或设置一个格式字符串，该字符串应用于传递给 或 方法的原始值的参数名称。

span.span: Gets or sets a format string to apply to the names of the parameters for original values that are passed to the or methods.

value.span: 一个表示格式字符串的字符串，它应用于传递给 或 方法的任何 或键参数的名称。

span.span: A string that represents a format string applied to the names of any or key parameters passed to the or methods.

value.span: 默认值为"{0}"，这意味着参数名称为字段名称。

span.span: The default is "{0}", which means the parameter name is the field name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的值仅应用于主键，如使用数据绑定控件的 `DataKeyNames` 属性标识的值，或者在 属性设置为 值并且将原始值集传递给相应的数据方法时的删除和更新方案。The value of the property is applied to primary keys only, such as those that are identified with the `DataKeyNames` property of a data-bound control, or in delete and update scenarios where the property is set to the value, and the set of original values are passed to the corresponding data method. 下面是两种可能更改 属性的常见方案：The following are two common scenarios where you might change the property: - 你可能需要更改属性以区分更新中的旧值和新值。You might want to change the property to differentiate between old and new values in updates. 属性设置为 值时，会将原始值和新值的参数添加到 集合。When the property is set to the value, parameters for both the original and new values are added to the collection. 如果没有格式字符串，则将为每个数据字段创建两个具有相同名称的参数。Without the formatting string, two parameters with the same name would be created for each data field. 通过更改原始值参数的名称，可以将数据与原始数据源进行比较，以检测冲突并比较键值。By changing the name of the original value parameter, you can compare the data to the original data source to detect conflicts and compare key values. - 某些可视化设计器为原始值和键实现了特定的命名方案。Some visual designers implement a particular naming scheme for original values and keys. 属性委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 属性。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 方法时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 通过用 集合中的参数调用由 属性标识的方法，从基础数据存储中检索数据。

span.span: Retrieves data from the underlying data storage by calling the method that is identified by the property with the parameters in the collection.

returns.span: 一个数据行的 列表。

span.span: An list of data rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的方法可能具有任何方法签名，但它必须从下表中列出的某个类型返回或派生，以便 控件成功调用它。The specified method might have any method signature, but it must return or be derived from one of the types listed in the following table for the control to call it successfully. |返回类型Return type|操作Action| |-----------------|------------| || 由 方法返回。The is returned by the method.| ||使用 创建 ，并由 方法返回。A is created by using the and returned by the method.| || 由 方法返回。The is returned by the method.| ||提取 的第一个 ，并通过 方法创建并返回 。The first of the is extracted and a is created and returned by the method.| ||对象包装在一个 集合中，并由 方法返回。The object is wrapped in a one-element collection and returned by the method.| 属性标识的方法可以是实例方法，也可以是 `static` （`Shared` Visual Basic）方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果它是实例方法，则每次调用 属性指定的方法时都会创建并销毁业务对象，只不过相同的实例用于调用由 属性指定的方法和由 属性指定的方法。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method that is specified by the property is called, except that the same instance is used to call the method that is specified by the property and the method that is specified by the property. 方法返回 接口。The method returns an interface. 但是，若要启用缓存和筛选方案，返回值必须是 的对象。However, to enable caching and filtering scenarios, the return value must be a object. 虽然 类未实现 接口， 控件会自动提取实现 的默认 控件。While the class does not implement the interface, the control automatically extracts the default control, which implements the . 在执行 操作之前，将调用 方法来引发 事件。Before the operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理 事件以检查参数的值，并在 操作之前执行任何预处理。You can handle the event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before a operation. 若要执行数据检索操作， 对象使用反射来创建由 属性标识的对象的实例。To perform a data retrieval operation, the object uses reflection to create an instance of the object that is identified by the property. 然后，它使用任意关联的 属性调用由 属性标识的方法。It then calls the method that is identified by the property, using any associated properties. 操作完成后，将调用 方法来引发 事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理 事件以检查任何返回值、输出参数和异常，并执行任何后续处理。You can handle the event to examine any return values, output parameters, and exceptions, and to perform any post-processing. 如果 属性返回一个 、或 对象并启用了缓存，则 操作期间， 将从缓存中检索数据并将数据保存到缓存中。If the property returns a , , or object and caching is enabled, the retrieves data from and saves data to the cache during the operation. 缓存是根据 和 属性的组合指定的缓存行为来创建、丢弃或刷新的。The cache is created, discarded, or refreshed based on the caching behavior that is specified by the combination of the and properties. 如果 属性返回 或 对象，但指定了 属性，则使用任何提供的 属性进行计算，并在 操作期间将生成的筛选器应用于数据列表。If the property returns a or object, and a property has been specified, it is evaluated with any supplied properties and the resulting filter is applied to the list of data during the operation. 方法委托给与 控件关联的 的 方法。The method delegates to the method of the that is associated with the control. 有关参数合并、对象生存期和方法解析的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see . ## 数据绑定控件Data-Bound Controls 控件与数据绑定控件（如 控件）关联时，无需从页代码中调用 方法。When the control is associated with a data-bound control, such as the control, it is not necessary to call the method from page code. 改为直接通过数据绑定控件调用 方法。The method is invoked directly by the data-bound control instead. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参阅。For a code example, see .

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件调用以检索行数的方法或函数的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the method or function that the control invokes to retrieve a row count.

value.span: 表示 用于检索行数的方法或函数的名称的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the method or function that the uses to retrieve a row count.

value.span: 此方法必须返回一个整数 ()。

span.span: The method must return an integer ().

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识用于检索总行数的业务对象方法，以支持数据源分页。The property identifies a business object method that is used to retrieve a total row count, to support data source paging. 仅当 属性设置为 `true`时，才计算 属性。The property is evaluated only if the property is set to `true`. 属性委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 属性。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. 有关 控件如何支持分页的信息，请参阅 。For information about how paging is supported by the control, see . ## Examples 以下三个示例演示了一个网页、一个代码隐藏页类和一个数据访问类，使用户能够选择页面中显示的记录数。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable the user to pick how many records are displayed in the page. 网页包含 属性设置为 `true`的 控件。The Web page contains an control whose property is set to `true`. 属性设置为方法的名称，该方法返回查询中的记录总数。The property is set to the name of a method that returns the total number of records in the query. 属性和 属性设置为 Select 方法中使用的参数的名称。The property and the property are set to the names of the parameters that are used in the Select method. 此页还包含一个 控件。The page also contains a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx#1)] 第二个示例显示 控件的 事件的处理程序。The second example shows a handler for the event of the control. 处理程序中的代码将 属性设置为用户的选择。The code in the handler sets the property to the user's selection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx.vb#2)] 第三个示例显示了从 Customers 表检索数据的数据访问类。The third example shows the data access class that retrieves data from the Customers table. 它包括一个名为 `GetSubsetOfEmployees`的方法，该方法分配给 控件的 属性。It includes a method named `GetSubsetOfEmployees`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 该示例还包括一个名为 `GetEmployeeCount`的方法，该方法分配给 控件的 属性。The example also includes a method named `GetEmployeeCount`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 类使用 LINQ 查询 Customers 表。The class uses LINQ to query the Customers table. 该示例需要一个表示 Northwind 数据库和 Customers 表的 LINQ to SQL 类。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Customers table. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 项目中创建 LINQ to SQL 类](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/App_Code/CustomerLogic.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/App_Code/CustomerLogic.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Selected As ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler

summary.span: 操作完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件以检查返回值或输出参数的值，或确定 操作完成后是否引发了异常。Handle the event to examine the values of a return value or output parameters, or to determine whether an exception was thrown after a operation has completed. 可从与事件关联的 对象中获取返回值、输出参数和异常处理属性。The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 以下三个示例演示了一个网页、一个代码隐藏页类和一个数据访问类，使用户能够在 Northwind 数据库中检索和更新 Employees 表中的记录。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable a user to retrieve and update records in the Employees table in the Northwind database. 第一个示例显示一个网页，其中包含两个 控件、一个 控件和一个 控件。The first example shows a Web page that contains two controls, a control, and a control. 第一个 控件和 控件用于从数据库检索和显示雇员姓名。The first control and the control are used to retrieve and display employee names from the database. 第二个 控件和 控件用于从用户选择的员工记录中检索、显示和修改数据。The second control and the control are used to retrieve, display, and modify the data from the employee record that is selected by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 第二个示例演示 和 事件的处理程序。The second example shows handlers for the and events. 事件处理程序将序列化包含从 Employee 表中检索到的数据的对象。The event handler serializes the object that contains data that was retrieved from the Employee table. 序列化的对象存储在视图状态中。The serialized object is stored in view state. 事件处理程序在视图状态中对对象进行反序列化，该对象包含要更新的数据记录的原始数据。The event handler deserializes the object in view state that contains the original data for the data record that is being updated. 包含原始数据的对象将作为参数传递给 Update 方法。The object that contains the original data is passed as a parameter to the Update method. 必须将原始数据传递到数据库，以便可以使用它来检查数据是否已被其他进程修改。The original data must be passed to the database so that it can be used to check whether the data has been modified by another process. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx.vb#2)] 第三个示例显示与 Northwind 数据库交互的数据访问类。The third example shows the data access class that interacts with the Northwind database. 类使用 LINQ 来查询和更新 Employees 表。The class uses LINQ to query and update the Employees table. 该示例需要一个 LINQ to SQL 类，该类表示 Northwind 数据库和 Employees 表。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Employees table. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 项目中创建 LINQ to SQL 类](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Selecting As ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler

summary.span: 在 操作前发生。

span.span: Occurs before a operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件以执行特定于您的应用程序的附加初始化，验证参数的值，或在 控件执行数据检索操作之前更改参数值。Handle the event to perform additional initialization that is specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the data retrieval operation. 参数可用作由 对象公开的 属性访问的 集合。The parameters are available as an collection that is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 如果设置了 属性，则对 方法的单个调用会引发此事件两次。This event can be fired twice for a single call to the method, if the property is set. 对象的 属性用于确定是否调用了 select 来检索数据或检索计数。The property of the object is used to determine if select was called to retrieve data or retrieve the count. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SelectMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SelectMethod : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件调用以检索数据的方法或函数的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the method or function that the control invokes to retrieve data.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示 用于检索数据的方法或函数的名称。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the method or function that the uses to retrieve data.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的方法可以具有任何方法签名，但它必须返回下表中显示的类型之一，以便 控件成功调用它。The specified method can have any method signature, but it must return one of the types shown in the following table for the control to call it successfully. |返回类型Return type|操作Action| |-----------------|------------| || 由 方法返回。The is returned by the method.| ||使用 创建 ，并由 方法返回。A is created using the and returned by the method.| || 方法返回 。A is returned by the method.| ||提取 的第一个 ，并通过 方法创建并返回 。The first of the is extracted, and a is created and returned by the method.| ||对象包装在一个 集合中，并由 方法返回。The object is wrapped in a one-element collection and returned by the method.| 属性委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 属性。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. 使用 类删除或更新数据时，请确保在 集合或 集合中为 控件配置的参数名称与 select 方法返回的列名称相匹配。When you use the class to delete or update data, make sure that the parameter names configured for the control in the collection or collection match the column names that are returned by the select method. ## 对象生存期Object Lifetime 属性标识的方法可以是实例方法，也可以是 `static` （`Shared` Visual Basic）方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果它是实例方法，则每次调用 属性指定的方法时都会创建并销毁业务对象。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method that is specified by the property is called. 在调用 属性指定的方法之前，您可以处理 和 事件来处理业务对象。You can handle the and events to work with the business object before the method that is specified by the property is called. 你还可以处理在调用 属性指定的方法之后引发的 事件。You can also handle the event that is raised after the method that is specified by the property is called. 如果业务对象实现 接口，则在销毁对象之前调用 方法。If the business object implements the interface, the method is called before the object is destroyed. 如果该方法是 `static` 的（`Shared` Visual Basic），则永远不会创建业务对象，也不能处理 、和 事件。If the method is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the business object is never created and you cannot handle the , , and events. ## 参数合并Parameter Merging 从这些源中将参数添加到 集合：Parameters are added to the collection from these sources: - 以声明方式从 `SelectParameters` 元素。Declaratively from the `SelectParameters` element. - 以编程方式从 `Selecting` 方法。Programmatically from the `Selecting` method. 首先，添加 `SelectParameters` 元素中列出的参数。First, the parameters listed in the `SelectParameters` element are added. 其次，参数以编程方式在 事件中添加和移除，该事件在 方法运行之前发生。Second, parameters are programmatically added and removed in the event, which occurs before the method is run. 合并参数后，解析方法。The method is resolved after the parameters are merged. 下一节将讨论方法解析。Method resolution is discussed in the next section. > [!IMPORTANT] > 你应验证从客户端接收的任何参数值。You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只需将参数值替换为 属性即可。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the property. ## 方法解析Method Resolution 调用 方法时，数据绑定控件中的数据字段、`SelectParameters` 元素中以声明方式创建的参数以及在 事件处理程序中添加的参数都将合并。When the method is called, the data fields from the data-bound control, the parameters that were created declaratively in the `SelectParameters` element, and the parameters that were added in the event handler are all merged. （有关详细信息，请参阅前面的部分。）然后， 控件将尝试查找要调用的方法。(For more information, see the preceding section.) The control then attempts to find a method to call. 首先，它会查找一个或多个具有在 属性中指定的名称的方法。First, it looks for one or more methods with the name that is specified in the property. 如果未找到匹配项，则会引发 异常。If no match is found, an exception is thrown. 如果找到匹配项，则它将查找匹配的参数名称。If a match is found, it then looks for matching parameter names. 例如，假设 属性指定的类型有两个名为 `SelectARecord`的方法。For example, suppose a type that is specified by the property has two methods named `SelectARecord`. 一个 `SelectARecord` 具有一个参数，`ID`，另一个 `SelectARecord` 具有两个参数，`Name` 和 `Number`。One `SelectARecord` has one parameter, `ID`, and the other `SelectARecord` has two parameters, `Name` and `Number`. 如果 集合只有一个名为 `ID`的参数，则将调用只包含 `ID` 参数的 `SelectARecord` 方法。If the collection has only one parameter named `ID`, the `SelectARecord` method with just the `ID` parameter is called. 解析方法时未检查参数类型。The type of the parameter is not checked in resolving the methods. 参数的顺序并不重要。The order of the parameters does not matter. 如果设置了 属性，则会以不同的方式解析方法。If the property is set, the method is resolved in a different way. 查找 属性中指定了名称的方法，该属性采用 属性中指定的类型的一个参数。The looks for a method with the name that is specified in the property that takes one parameter of the type that is specified in the property. 在这种情况下，参数名称并不重要。In this case, the name of the parameter does not matter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 控件如何使用 控件在 Web 窗体页上显示数据。The following code example demonstrates how a control can display data using an control on a Web Forms page. 标识部分或完全限定类名及其 属性，并使用调用的方法来检索带有 属性的数据。The identifies a partially or fully qualified class name with its property and a method that is called to retrieve data with its property. 在运行时，将创建对象并使用反射调用方法。At run time, the object is created and the method is called using reflection. 控件枚举由 属性指定的方法返回的 集合，并显示数据。The control enumerates through the collection that is returned by the method that is specified by the property, and displays the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/CS/objds1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/VB/objds1vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SelectParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 获取参数的集合，这些参数由 属性指定的方法使用。

span.span: Gets a collection of parameters that are used by the method specified by the property.

value.span: 参数的集合，这些参数由 属性指定的方法使用。

span.span: A collection of parameters that are used by the method specified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可获取与 控件关联的 对象的 属性。The property gets the property of the object that is associated with the control. 使用 `SelectParameters` 元素以声明方式将参数添加到 集合，或在 事件的处理程序中以编程方式向其添加参数。You add parameters to the collection declaratively by using the `SelectParameters` element or programmatically in the handler for the event. 在运行时，将在 `SelectParameters` 元素中列出的参数首先添加到集合中。At run time, parameters listed in the `SelectParameters` element are added to the collection first. 然后， 事件的处理程序会添加或删除集合中的参数。Parameters in the collection are then added or removed by the handler for the event. 事件在 方法运行前引发。The event is raised before the method is run. 在运行 方法之前， 集合中包含的参数的名称和类型必须与 属性指定的方法的签名相匹配。Before the method is run, the names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the signature of the method that is specified by the property. 例如，如果一个名为 `GetEmployeesByStateAndAge` 的 select 方法采用 `string` 并且整数作为参数，则 集合必须包含两个参数。For example, if a select method named `GetEmployeesByStateAndAge` takes a `string` and an integer as parameters, the collection must contain two parameters. 第一个参数必须解析为字符串，第二个参数必须解析为一个整数。The first parameter must resolve to a string and the second parameter must resolve to an integer. 可以在 `SelectParameters` 元素的标记中指定这两个参数。Both parameters can be specified in markup in the `SelectParameters` element. 或者，可以将它们添加到 事件处理程序中，也可以在标记中添加一个参数，并以编程方式添加另一个参数。Alternatively, they can be can be added in the event handler, or one parameter can be added in markup and the other one can be added programmatically. 有关详细信息，请参阅[将参数用于 ObjectDataSource 控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)和 属性。For more information, see [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4) and the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在 事件处理程序的代码中或 属性指定的方法中，请确保验证从客户端收到的任何参数值。In the code for the event handler or in the method that is specified by the property, make sure that you validate any parameter value that is received from the client. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件检索单个数据记录并将其显示在 控件中。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve a single data record using an control and display it in a control. 控件通过调用 `EmployeeLogic` 类的 `GetEmployee` 方法来检索特定的雇员记录。The control retrieves a specific employee record by calling the `GetEmployee` method of the `EmployeeLogic` class. `GetEmployee` 方法需要 employee ID 参数。The `GetEmployee` method requires an employee ID parameter. 控件在标记中使用 `QueryStringParameter` 元素来创建 对象，该对象将从 URL 检索指定的查询字符串参数的值并将其传递给 `GetEmployee` 方法。The control uses a `QueryStringParameter` element in markup to create a object that will retrieve the value of a specified query-string parameter from the URL and pass it to the `GetEmployee` method. 其他参数类可用于检索来自其他源的值，例如控件属性、窗体字段、cookie、ASP.NET 配置文件数据或会话状态。Other parameter classes can be used to retrieve values from other sources, such as control properties, form fields, cookies, ASP.NET profile data, or session state. 你还可以使用在标记中定义的参数对象，以便将硬编码值传递给 select 方法。You can also use a parameter object that is defined in markup in order to pass a hard-coded value to the select method. 有关可用参数类的详细信息，请参阅将[参数用于筛选的数据源控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/xt50s8kz(v=vs.100))。For more information about parameter classes that are available, see [Using Parameters with Data Source Controls for Filtering](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/xt50s8kz(v=vs.100)). 若要运行此示例，你将需要以下各项：To run this example, you will need the following: - 一个网站，该网站具有连接到 Northwind 商贸数据库的名为 `NorthwindConnection` 的连接字符串。A Web site that has a connection string named `NorthwindConnection` that connects to the Northwind Traders database. 有关详细信息，请参阅 类概述。For more information, see the class overview. - 作为 类概述的代码示例之一显示的 `EmployeeLogic` 类。The `EmployeeLogic` class that is shown as one of the code examples for the class overview. 类文件必须位于 App_Code 文件夹中。The class file must be located in the App_Code folder. - 示例代码可作为 .aspx 页运行。The sample code can be run as an .aspx page. 如果不使用查询字符串参数请求页面，则会显示错误消息。If you request the page without a query-string parameter, an error message is displayed. 如果在 .aspx 文件的名称后使用查询字符串（例如 `?empid=1`）来请求页面，则会看到请求的雇员的详细信息。If you request the page using a query string such as `?empid=1` after the name of the .aspx file, you will see the details for the requested employee. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3/CS/objds3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3/VB/objds3vb.aspx#1)]

member this.SortParameterName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置业务对象的名称， 参数使用此业务对象指定数据源排序支持的排序表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the business object that the parameter used to specify a sort expression for data source sorting support.

value.span: 方法参数的名称，此方法参数用于指示哪个参数用于排序数据。

span.span: The name of the method parameter used to indicate the parameter which is used to sort the data.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于支持数据源排序。The property is used to support data source sorting. 当 对象上设置 属性并将其传递给 方法时， 值将根据数据的排序方式标识 业务对象方法的参数名称。When a property is set on the object and passed to the method, the value identifies the parameter name of the business object method according to which the data is sorted. 如果 与数据绑定控件关联，传递给此参数的值将采用以逗号分隔的字段值的形式，后跟 `"ASC"` 或 `"DESC"`。If the is associated with a data-bound control, the values that are passed to this parameter take the form of comma-separated field values followed by `"ASC"` or `"DESC"`. 例如，`Name` 的升序排序的值将为 `"Name ASC"`。For example, the value for an ascending sort on `Name` would be `"Name ASC"`. 属性委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 属性。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何实现支持排序的类型。The first code example demonstrates how to implement a type that supports sorting. 第二个代码示例演示如何实现排序表达式。The second code example demonstrates how to implement a sort expression. 下面的代码示例演示如何实现支持排序的类型。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a type that supports sorting. `SortingData` 类的 `SelectMethod` 采用参数，`sortExpression`。The `SelectMethod` of the `SortingData` class takes a parameter, `sortExpression`. 传递给 `SelectMethod` 的字符串将用于 `SelectMethod`返回的 对象的 属性。The string that is passed to `SelectMethod` is used for the property of the object that is returned by `SelectMethod`. [!code-csharp[ObjectDataSourceSorting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceSorting/CS/SortingData.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ObjectDataSourceSorting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceSorting/VB/SortingData.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何实现排序表达式。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a sort expression. 网页中的代码将创建 控件的实例。The code in the Web page creates an instance of the control. 属性设置为 `SortingData`， 属性设置为 `sortExpression`。The property is set to `SortingData` and the property is set to `sortExpression`. 控件的 属性设置为 `true`。The property of the control is set to `true`. 用户单击**排序**按钮时，会将字段名称 `Name` 或 `Number`传递给 Sort 参数中的 `SelectMethod`。When the user clicks the **Sort** button, the field name, `Name` or `Number`, is passed to `SelectMethod` in the sort parameter. [!code-aspx-csharp[ObjectDataSourceSorting#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceSorting/CS/SortingDataExample.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[ObjectDataSourceSorting#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceSorting/VB/SortingDataExampleVB.aspx#2)]

Public Overridable Property SqlCacheDependency As String

member this.SqlCacheDependency : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个用分号分隔的字符串，指示用于 Microsoft SQL Server 缓存依赖项的数据库和表。

span.span: Gets or sets a semicolon-delimited string that indicates which databases and tables to use for the Microsoft SQL Server cache dependency.

value.span: 一个字符串，指示用于 SQL Server 缓存依赖项的数据库和表。

span.span: A string that indicates which databases and tables to use for the SQL Server cache dependency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持基于数据缓存的 对象的可选过期策略（必须为数据库服务器配置服务）。The control supports an optional expiration policy that is based on the object for the data cache (the service must be configured for the database server). SQL Server 支持两种缓存失效机制：轮询和通知。SQL Server supports two mechanisms for cache invalidation: polling and notification. 每种机制都为 对象提供了不同的语法。Each mechanism has a different syntax for the object. 仅支持轮询。The supports only polling. 字符串用于创建在执行 方法之前传递到 构造函数的 对象。The string is used to create a object that is passed to the constructor before the method is executed. 字符串根据 `@ Page` 指令使用的相同格式标识数据库和表，其中字符串的第一部分是 SQL Server 数据库的连接字符串，后跟一个冒号分隔符，最后是数据库表的名称（例如 `"connectionstring1:table1"`）。The string identifies databases and tables according to the same format that is used by the `@ Page` directive, where the first part of the string is a connection string to a SQL Server database, followed by a colon delimiter, and finally the name of the database table (for example, `"connectionstring1:table1"`). 如果 属性依赖于多个表，则连接字符串和表名称对用分号分隔（例如，`"connectionstring1:table1";connectionstring2:table2"`）。If the property depends on more than one table, the connection string and table name pairs are separated by semicolons (for example, `"connectionstring1:table1";connectionstring2:table2"`). 若要支持通知，你必须在 属性的实现中编写缓存逻辑，并在代码中处理 对象的构造。To support notification, you must write the cache logic in the implementation of your property and handle the construction of the object in your code. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何创建 SQL Server 的缓存依赖项，以及如何设置 对象的 属性。The first code example demonstrates how to create a SQL Server cache dependency and set the property of a object. 第二个代码示例演示如何实现返回 对象的包装方法，以便使用 对象启用缓存和筛选。The second code example demonstrates how to implement a wrapper method that returns a object to enable caching and filtering with an object. 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 SQL Server 的缓存依赖项，以及如何设置 控件的 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a SQL Server cache dependency and set the property of a control. 在此示例中，数据库每120秒轮询一次。In this example, the database is polled every 120 seconds. 如果 Northwind 商贸 Employees 表中的数据在这段时间内发生更改，则由 控件缓存并由 控件显示的所有数据都将过期，并在下一次请求页面时检索一组新数据。If the data in the Northwind Traders Employees table changes during that time, any data that is cached by the control and displayed by the control is expired and a new set of data is retrieved on the next request for the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_7#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_7/CS/objds7cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_7#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_7/VB/objds7vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何实现一个包装方法，该方法返回 对象以使用 控件启用缓存和筛选。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a wrapper method that returns a object to enable caching and filtering with an control. 在 `EmployeeLogic` 类的基实现中，`GetAllEmployees` 方法返回 对象。In the base implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` class, the `GetAllEmployees` method returns an object. 添加一个名为 `GetAllEmployeesAsDataSet` 的包装方法，该方法将 `NorthwindEmployee` 数据作为 返回，而不是完全重构对象以使用 Web 窗体页上的 。Instead of refactoring the object completely to work with the on a Web Forms page, a wrapper method named `GetAllEmployeesAsDataSet` is added that returns a set of `NorthwindEmployee` data as a . [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_5#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_5/CS/northwindemployee5.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_5#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_5/VB/northwindemployee5.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ StartRowIndexParameterName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.StartRowIndexParameterName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置数据检索方法参数的名称，该参数用于指示为数据源分页支持检索的第一条记录的标识符的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the data retrieval method parameter that is used to indicate the value of the identifier of the first record to retrieve for data source paging support.

value.span: 业务对象方法参数的名称，该参数用于指示要检索的第一条记录。

span.span: The name of the business object method parameter used to indicate the first record to retrieve.

value.span: 该参数必须返回整数值。

span.span: The parameter must return an integer value.

value.span: 默认值为"startRowIndex"。

span.span: The default is "startRowIndex".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于支持数据源分页。The property is used to support data source paging. 有关 控件如何支持分页的信息，请参阅 。For information about how paging is supported by the control, see . 属性委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 属性。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. ## Examples 以下三个示例演示了一个网页、一个代码隐藏页类和一个数据访问类，使用户能够选择页面中显示的记录数。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable the user to pick how many records are displayed in the page. 网页包含 属性设置为 `true`的 控件。The Web page contains an control whose property is set to `true`. 属性设置为方法的名称，该方法返回查询中的记录总数。The property is set to the name of a method that returns the total number of records in the query. 属性和 属性设置为 Select 方法中使用的参数的名称。The property and the property are set to the names of the parameters that are used in the Select method. 此页还包含一个 控件。The page also contains a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx#1)] 第二个示例显示 控件的 事件的处理程序。The second example shows a handler for the event of the control. 处理程序中的代码将 属性设置为用户的选择。The code in the handler sets the property to the user's selection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx.vb#2)] 第三个示例显示了从 Customers 表检索数据的数据访问类。The third example shows the data access class that retrieves data from the Customers table. 它包括一个名为 `GetSubsetOfEmployees`的方法，该方法分配给 控件的 属性。It includes a method named `GetSubsetOfEmployees`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 该示例还包括一个名为 `GetEmployeeCount`的方法，该方法分配给 控件的 属性。The example also includes a method named `GetEmployeeCount`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 类使用 LINQ 查询 Customers 表。The class uses LINQ to query the Customers table. 该示例需要一个表示 Northwind 数据库和 Customers 表的 LINQ to SQL 类。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Customers table. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 项目中创建 LINQ to SQL 类](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/App_Code/CustomerLogic.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/App_Code/CustomerLogic.vb#3)]

span.span: Tracks view-state changes to the control so that they can be stored in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写 方法，以将起始点标记为开始跟踪，并将更改保存为对象的视图状态的一部分。The method is overridden to mark the starting point to begin tracking and saving changes to the control as part of the view state for the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TypeName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TypeName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象表示的类的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the class that the object represents.

value.span: 标识 表示的对象类型的部分或完全限定类名。

span.span: A partially or fully qualified class name that identifies the type of the object that the represents.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建 控件绑定到的对象的实例，控件将使用反射来加载运行时由类型名称标识的类型。To create an instance of the object that the control binds to, the control uses reflection to load the type that is identified by the type name at run time. 因此， 属性的值可以是位于 Bin 或 App_Code 目录中的代码的部分限定类型，也可以是在全局程序集缓存中注册的代码的完全限定的类型名称。Therefore, the value of the property can be a partially qualified type for code that is located in the Bin or App_Code directories or a fully qualified type name for code that is registered in the global assembly cache. 如果使用全局程序集缓存，则必须将相应的引用添加到 Machine.config 或 web.config 文件的 `assemblies` 部分。If you use the global assembly cache, you must add the appropriate reference to the `assemblies` section of the Machine.config or Web.config file. 该类型必须具有无参数的构造函数，除非你处理 事件自行创建它的实例。The type must have a parameterless constructor, unless you handle the event to create an instance of it yourself. 如果该类型的方法是成员方法，则为每次调用 、、和 方法创建类型的实例。An instance of the type is created for each call to the , , , and methods, if the methods on the type are member methods. 如果 `static` 方法（`Shared` Visual Basic），则不会创建实例。An instance is not created if the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 如果类型实现 接口，则在销毁对象之前调用 方法。If the type implements the interface, the method is called before the object is destroyed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 控件如何通过在 Web 窗体页上使用 控件来显示数据。The following code example demonstrates how a control can display data by using an control on a Web Forms page. 标识部分或完全限定类名及其 属性，并使用调用的方法来检索带有 属性的数据。The identifies a partially or fully qualified class name with its property and a method that is called to retrieve data with its property. 在运行时，将创建对象并使用反射调用方法。At run time, the object is created and the method is called using reflection. 控件枚举 属性返回的 集合，并显示数据。The control enumerates through the collection that is returned by the property, and displays the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/CS/objds1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/VB/objds1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示 属性值引用的类。The following example shows the class that the property value refers to. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/CS/northwindemployee1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/VB/northwindemployee1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 Update() cil managed

summary.span: 通过调用 属性标识的方法和 集合中的所有参数，执行更新操作。

span.span: Performs an update operation by calling the method that is identified by the property and any parameters that are in the collection.

returns.span: 一个值，表示基础数据存储中更新的行数。

span.span: A value that represents the number of rows updated in the underlying data storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 假定业务对象每次更新一条记录，而不是在批处理中更新数据。The business object is assumed to update data one record at a time, rather than in a batch. 在执行 操作之前，将调用 方法来引发 事件。Before the operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理 事件以检查参数的值，并在 操作之前执行任何预处理。You can handle the event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before an operation. 若要执行更新操作， 对象使用反射来创建由 属性标识的对象的实例。To perform an update operation, the object uses reflection to create an instance of the object that is identified by the property. 然后，它使用任意关联的 属性调用由 属性标识的方法。It then calls the method that is identified by the property, using any associated properties. 操作完成后，将调用 方法来引发 事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理 事件以检查任何返回值、输出参数和异常，并执行任何后续处理。You can handle the event to examine any return values, output parameters, and exceptions, and to perform any post-processing. 方法委托给与 控件关联的 的 方法。The method delegates to the method of the that is associated with the control. 有关参数合并、对象生存期和方法解析的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 你应验证从客户端接收的任何参数值。You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只需将参数值替换为 属性即可。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the property. ## 数据绑定控件Data-Bound Controls 控件与数据绑定控件（如 控件）关联时，无需从页代码中调用 方法。When the control is associated with a data-bound control, such as the control, it is not necessary to call the method from page code. 改为直接通过数据绑定控件调用 方法。The method is invoked directly by the data-bound control instead. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 控件、 控件和几个 对象来更新数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several objects to update data. 第二个代码示例演示了第一个代码示例中使用的 `EmployeeLogic` 类。The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件、 控件和几个 控件来更新数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several controls to update data. 显示 Northwind 雇员的姓名，而 控件用于输入和更新地址信息。The displays the name of a Northwind employee, while the controls are used to enter and update address information. 由于 集合包含绑定到 的选定值的 对象，因此仅在选择了员工之后才会启用引发 操作的按钮。Because the collection contains a object that is bound to the selected value of the , the button that raises the operation is enabled only after an employee is selected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/CS/objds12cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/VB/objds12vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了前面的代码示例中使用的 `EmployeeLogic` 类。The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/CS/northwindemployee12.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/VB/northwindemployee12.vb#2)]
