remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件假设由 属性标识的方法每次执行一个更新，而不是在批处理中执行更新。The control assumes that the method that is identified by the property performs updates one at a time, rather than in a batch. 属性委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 属性。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. 请确保为 集合中的 控件配置的参数名称与 select 方法返回的列名称相匹配。Make sure that the parameter names configured for the control in the collection match the column names that are returned by the select method. ## 对象生存期Object Lifetime 属性标识的方法可以是实例方法，也可以是 `static` （`Shared` Visual Basic）方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果它是实例方法，则每次调用 属性指定的方法时都会创建并销毁业务对象。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method that is specified by the property is called. 在调用 属性指定的方法之前，您可以处理 和 事件来处理业务对象。You can handle the and events to work with the business object before the method that is specified by the property is called. 你还可以处理在调用 属性指定的方法之后引发的 事件。You can also handle the event that is raised after the method that is specified by the property is called. 如果业务对象实现 接口，则在销毁对象之前调用 方法。If the business object implements the interface, the method is called before the object is destroyed. 如果该方法是 `static` 的（`Shared` Visual Basic），则永远不会创建业务对象，也不能处理 、和 事件。If the method is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the business object is never created and you cannot handle the , , and events. ## 参数合并Parameter Merging 从三个源将参数添加到 集合：Parameters are added to the collection from three sources: - 在运行时从数据绑定控件。From the data-bound control, at run time. - 从 `UpdateParameters` 元素中，以声明方式。From the `UpdateParameters` element, declaratively. - 以编程方式从 事件处理程序。From the event handler, programmatically. 首先，将从数据绑定控件生成的所有参数添加到 集合中。First, any parameters that are generated from data-bound controls are added to the collection. 例如，如果 控件绑定到 控件，该控件具有 `Name` 和 `Number`的列，则 `Name` 和 `Number` 的参数将添加到集合中。For example, if the control is bound to a control that has the columns `Name` and `Number`, the parameters for `Name` and `Number` are added to the collection. 参数的确切名称取决于 属性。The exact name of the parameter depends on the property. 这些参数的数据类型为 `string`。The data type of these parameters is `string`. 接下来，将添加 `UpdateParameters` 元素中列出的参数。Next, the parameters that are listed in the `UpdateParameters` element are added. 如果找到 `UpdateParameters` 元素中与已在 集合中的参数相同的参数，则会修改现有参数，使其与 `UpdateParameters` 元素中指定的参数匹配。If a parameter in the `UpdateParameters` element is found with the same name as a parameter that is already in the collection, the existing parameter is modified to match the parameter that is specified in the `UpdateParameters` element. 通常，这用于修改参数中数据的类型。Typically, this is used to modify the type of the data in the parameter. 最后，你可以以编程方式在 事件中添加和移除参数，这会在 方法运行之前发生。Finally, you can programmatically add and remove parameters in the event, which occurs before the method is run. 合并参数后，解析方法。The method is resolved after the parameters are merged. 下一节将讨论方法解析。Method resolution is discussed in the next section. > [!IMPORTANT] > 你应验证从客户端接收的任何参数值。You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只需将参数值替换为 属性即可。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the property. ## 方法解析Method Resolution 调用 方法时，数据绑定控件中的数据字段、`UpdateParameters` 元素中以声明方式创建的参数以及在 事件处理程序中添加的参数都将合并。When the method is called, the data fields from the data-bound control, the parameters that were created declaratively in the `UpdateParameters` element, and the parameters that were added in the event handler are all merged. （有关详细信息，请参阅前面的部分。）然后， 控件将尝试查找要调用的方法。(For more information, see the preceding section.) The control then attempts to find a method to call. 首先，它会查找一个或多个具有在 属性中指定的名称的方法。First, it looks for one or more methods with the name that is specified in the property. 如果未找到匹配项，则会引发 异常。If no match is found, an exception is thrown. 如果找到匹配项，则它将查找匹配的参数名称。If a match is found, it then looks for matching parameter names. 例如，假设 属性指定的类型有两个名为 `UpdateARecord`的方法。For example, suppose a type that is specified by the property has two methods named `UpdateARecord`. 一个 `UpdateARecord` 具有一个参数，`ID`，另一个 `UpdateARecord` 具有两个参数，`Name` 和 `Number`。One `UpdateARecord` has one parameter, `ID`, and the other `UpdateARecord` has two parameters, `Name` and `Number`. 如果 集合只有一个名为 `ID`的参数，则将调用只包含 `ID` 参数的 `UpdateARecord` 方法。If the collection has only one parameter named `ID`, the `UpdateARecord` method with just the `ID` parameter is called. 解析方法时未检查参数类型。The type of the parameter is not checked in resolving the methods. 参数的顺序并不重要。The order of the parameters does not matter. 如果设置了 属性，则会以不同的方式解析方法。If the property is set, the method is resolved in a different way. 查找 属性中指定了名称的方法，该属性采用 属性中指定的类型的一个参数。The looks for a method with the name that is specified in the property that takes one parameter of the type that is specified in the property. 在这种情况下，参数名称并不重要。In this case, the name of the parameter does not matter. ## Examples 以下三个示例演示了一个网页、一个代码隐藏页类和一个数据访问类，使用户能够在 Northwind 数据库中检索和更新 Employees 表中的记录。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable a user to retrieve and update records in the Employees table in the Northwind database. 第一个示例显示一个网页，其中包含两个 控件、一个 控件和一个 控件。The first example shows a Web page that contains two controls, a control, and a control. 第一个 控件和 控件用于从数据库检索和显示雇员姓名。The first control and the control are used to retrieve and display employee names from the database. 第二个 控件和 控件用于从用户选择的员工记录中检索、显示和修改数据。The second control and the control are used to retrieve, display, and modify the data from the employee record that is selected by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 第二个示例演示 和 事件的处理程序。The second example shows handlers for the and events. 事件处理程序将序列化包含从 Employee 表中检索到的数据的对象。The event handler serializes the object that contains data that was retrieved from the Employee table. 序列化的对象存储在视图状态中。The serialized object is stored in view state. 事件处理程序在视图状态中对对象进行反序列化，该对象包含要更新的数据记录的原始数据。The event handler deserializes the object in view state that contains the original data for the data record that is being updated. 包含原始数据的对象将作为参数传递给 Update 方法。The object that contains the original data is passed as a parameter to the Update method. 必须将原始数据传递到数据库，以便可以使用它来检查数据是否已被其他进程修改。The original data must be passed to the database so that it can be used to check whether the data has been modified by another process. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx.vb#2)] 第三个示例显示与 Northwind 数据库交互的数据访问类。The third example shows the data access class that interacts with the Northwind database. 类使用 LINQ 来查询和更新 Employees 表。The class uses LINQ to query and update the Employees table. 该示例需要一个 LINQ to SQL 类，该类表示 Northwind 数据库和 Employees 表。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Employees table. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 项目中创建 LINQ to SQL 类](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中包含的参数的名称和类型必须匹配 方法签名中的参数的名称和类型。The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the names and types of the parameters in the method signature. 参数名称受 属性影响，并区分大小写。The parameter names are affected by the property and are case-sensitive. 集合中的参数取决于数据绑定控件中的数据、以声明方式指定的参数和以编程方式添加的参数。The parameters in the collection depend on the data in the data-bound control, the parameters that are specified declaratively, and the parameters that are added programmatically. 有关详细信息，请参阅 中的 "参数合并" 部分，并[将参数用于 ObjectDataSource 控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。For more information, see the "Parameter Merging" section in and [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4). 属性检索与 控件关联的 对象所包含的 属性。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. 有关参数合并、对象生存期和方法解析的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 你应验证从客户端接收的任何参数值。You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只需将参数值替换为 属性即可。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the property. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 控件、 控件和几个 对象来更新数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several objects to update data. 第二个代码示例演示了第一个代码示例中使用的 `EmployeeLogic` 类。The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件、 控件和几个 控件来更新数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several controls to update data. 显示 Northwind 雇员的姓名，而 控件用于输入和更新地址信息。The displays the name of a Northwind employee, while the controls are used to enter and update address information. 由于 集合包含绑定到 的选定值的 ，因此仅在选择了员工之后才会启用引发 操作的按钮。Because the collection contains a that is bound to the selected value of the , the button that raises the operation is enabled only after an employee is selected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/CS/objds12cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/VB/objds12vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了前面的代码示例中使用的 `EmployeeLogic` 类。The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Updating As ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler

summary.span: 在 操作前发生。

span.span: Occurs before an operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件以执行特定于您的应用程序的其他初始化，验证参数的值，或在 控件执行更新操作之前更改参数值。Handle the event to perform additional initialization that is specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the update operation. 参数可用作由 对象公开的 属性访问的 集合。The parameters are available as an collection that is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 以下三个示例演示了一个网页、一个代码隐藏页类和一个数据访问类，使用户能够在 Northwind 数据库中检索和更新 Employees 表中的记录。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable a user to retrieve and update records in the Employees table in the Northwind database. 第一个示例显示一个网页，其中包含两个 控件、一个 控件和一个 控件。The first example shows a Web page that contains two controls, a control, and a control. 第一个 控件和 控件用于从数据库检索和显示雇员姓名。The first control and the control are used to retrieve and display employee names from the database. 第二个 控件和 控件用于从用户选择的员工记录中检索、显示和修改数据。The second control and the control are used to retrieve, display, and modify the data from the employee record that is selected by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 第二个示例演示 和 事件的处理程序。The second example shows handlers for the and events. 事件处理程序将序列化包含从 Employee 表中检索到的数据的对象。The event handler serializes the object that contains data that was retrieved from the Employee table. 序列化的对象存储在视图状态中。The serialized object is stored in view state. 事件处理程序在视图状态中对对象进行反序列化，该对象包含要更新的数据记录的原始数据。The event handler deserializes the object in view state that contains the original data for the data record that is being updated. 包含原始数据的对象将作为参数传递给 Update 方法。The object that contains the original data is passed as a parameter to the Update method. 必须将原始数据传递到数据库，以便可以使用它来检查数据是否已被其他进程修改。The original data must be passed to the database so that it can be used to check whether the data has been modified by another process. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx.vb#2)] 第三个示例显示与 Northwind 数据库交互的数据访问类。The third example shows the data access class that interacts with the Northwind database. 类使用 LINQ 来查询和更新 Employees 表。The class uses LINQ to query and update the Employees table. 该示例需要一个 LINQ to SQL 类，该类表示 Northwind 数据库和 Employees 表。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Employees table. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 项目中创建 LINQ to SQL 类](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.vb#5)]
